eng: ORDERS OF THE DAY:
tso: MINONGONOKO YA SIKU:

eng: Introduction – Adjustments Appropriation Bill [B 10 – 2020] (National Assembly – proposed sec 77) and tabling of Division of Revenue Amendment Bill [B 9 – 2020] (National Assembly – proposed sec 76) – (Minister of Finance).
tso: Masungulo –Nawumbisi wa swa Mikavelo ya Timali ta Tiko wa [B 10 – 2020] (Huvo ya Rixaka –xiyenge xa 77 lexi ringanyetiweke) na ku andlaariwa ka Nawumbisi wo Cinca Maavelo ya Mali ya Tiko wa [B 9 – 2020] (Huvo ya Rixaka–xiyenge xa 76 lexi ringanyetiweke) – (Holobye wa swa Timali).

eng: Introduction – Disaster Management Tax Relief Bill [B 11 – 2020] (National Assembly – proposed sec 77) and tabling of Disaster Management Tax Relief Administration Bill [B 12 – 2020] (National Assembly – proposed sec 75) – (Minister of Finance).
tso: Masungulo –Nawumbisi wa Xibalo xa Mphalalo xa Malawulelo ya Timhangu wa [B 11 – 2020] (Huvo ya Rixaka –xiyenge xa 77 lexi ringanyetiweke) na ku andlariwa ka Nawumbisi wa Xibalo xa Mphalalo xa Malawulelo ya Timhangu wa [B 12 – 2020] (Huvo ya Rixaka–xiyenge xa 75 lexi ringanyetiweke) – (Holobye wa swa Timali).

tso: NTIRHO KU YISA EMAHLWENI

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Trade and Industry on Oversight visit to Gauteng (Announcement, Tablings and Committee Reports, 23 June 2020, p 17).
tso: Ku tekeriwa enhlokweni ka Xiviko xa Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Bindzu na Vumaki hhi mayelana na rendzo ro angamela ro ya eGauteng (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 23 Khotavuxika 2020, papila ra 17).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Trade and Industry on Oversight visit to Western Cape (Announcement, Tablings and Committee Reports, 23 June 2020, p 4).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Justice and Correctional Services on Notices determining remuneration of Public Protector and Commissioners of South African Human Rights Commission with effect from 1 April 2019 (Announcement, Tablings and Committee Reports, 22 June 2020, p 15).
tso: Ku tekeriwa enhlokweni ka Xiviko xa Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Vululami na Vukorhokeri bya Makhotso hi mayelana na switiviso leswi bohaka ku holeriwa ka Musirheleri wa vaakitiko na Vakhomixinara va Khomixini ya Timfanelo ta Ximunhu ya Afrika-Dzonga kusukela hi ti 1 Dzivamisoko 2019 (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 23 Khotavuxika 2020, papila ra 15).

eng: MOTIONS:
tso: TIMOXINI:

eng: Draft resolution (Chief Whip of the Majority Party): That the House, notwithstanding Rule 27 on the election of temporary presiding officer, elects Mr Q R Dyantyi and Ms T Mahambehlala to act as temporary presiding officers in the chamber during hybrid sittings of the National Assembly, as and when necessary, for the duration of the 2020 annual session.
tso: Xiboho xa mpfapfarhuto (Ximokonkulu xa Vandla leri Fumaka): Leswaku Yindlu, handle ko tsan’wa Nawu wa 27 eka mahlawulelo ya vaofisara lava rhangelaka nhlawulo, yi hlawula Tatana Q R Dyantyi na Manana T Mahambehlala ku khomela tanihi vaofisara lava rhangelaka nhlawulo va nkarhinyana eka Yindlu hi nkarhi wa mintshamo ya nhlanganelo ya Huvo ya Rixaka, loko swi fanerile, eka nkarhi wa sexini ya lembe ra 2020.

eng: Draft resolution (Chief Whip of the Majority Party): That the House –
tso: Xiboho xa nkarhinyana (Ximokonkulu xa Vandla leri Fumaka): Leswaku Huvo –

eng: notes that –
tso: Yi lemuka leswaku –

eng: on 25 July 2019 an Ad Hoc Committee to initiate and introduce legislation amending section 25 of the Constitution was established and mandated to complete its task and report to the House by 31 March 2020;
tso: hi ti 25 Mawuwani 2019 Komiti ya Nkarhinyana yo sungula no tivisa nawu lowu cincaka xiyenge xa 25 xa Vumbiwa yi tumbuluxiwile no nyikiwa matimba yo hetisa ntirho wa yona no vikela Huvo hi ti 31 Nyanyankulu 2020;

eng: on 5 March 2020, the Assembly extended the deadline for reporting to 29 May 2020;
tso: hi ti 5 Nyenyankulu 2020, Huvo yi engetele nkarhi wo vika hawona ku ya eka siku ra ti 29 Mudyaxihi 2020;

eng: the Ad Hoc Committee ceased to exist on 29 May 2020 before it could complete its mandate;
tso: Komit ya Nkarhinyana yi hetelele ku tirha hi ti 29 Mudyaxihi 2020 yi nga se heta ntirho wa yona;

eng: re-establishes the Ad Hoc to initiate and introduce legislation amending section 25 of the Constitution with the same composition and powers as its predecessor (Minutes of Proceedings, 25 July 2019, p 68);
tso: yi tlhela yi tumbuluxa Huvo ya Nkarhinyana ku sungula no tivisa nawu lowu cincaka xiyenge xa 25 xa vumbiwa leyi nga ta vumbiwa no va na matimba ku fana na huvo leya khale (Makanelwa ya Mafambiselo, 25 Mawuwani 2019, p 68);

eng: instructs the Committee to incorporate in its work the proceedings and all the work of the previous committee up to and including 29 May 2020; and
tso: yi lerisa Komiti leswaku eka ntirho wa yona, yi nghenisa mafambiselo na ntirho hinkwawo wa komiti leyi nga hundza ku fikela no katsa 29 Mudyaxihi 2020;

eng: sets the deadline by which the Committee is to report to 31 December 2020.
tso: yi veka siku leri Komiti yi faneleke ku vika ha rona ku va 31 N’wendzamhala 2020.

eng: ORDERS OF THE DAY:
tso: MINONGONOKO YA SIKU:

eng: Debate in terms of Rule 130: The scourge of gender-based violence against women and femicide – (Ms N V Mente).
tso: Njhekanjhekisano hi ku landza Nawu wa 130: Nhlomulo wa madzolonga ya swa rimbewu ehenhla ka vavasati no dlawa ka vaxisati hi vavanuna – (Manana N V Mente).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Justice and Correctional Services on Notices determining remuneration of Public Protector and Commissioners of South African Human Rights Commission with effect from 1 April 2019 (Announcement, Tablings and Committee Reports, 22 June 2020, p 15).
tso: Ku tekeriwa enhlokweni ka Xiviko xa Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Vululami na Vukorhokeri bya Makhotso hi mayelana na Switiviso leswi bohaka muholo wa Musirheleri wa Vaaki na Vakhomixinara va Khomixini ya Timfanelo ta Ximunhu ya Afrika-Dzonga kusukela hi ti 1 Dzivamisoko 2019 (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 22 Khotavuxika 2020, papila ra 15).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs on Petition from the residents of Boksburg, Ekurhuleni metropolitan municipality, calling on the Assembly to investigate the numerous power outages (submitted by Mr M Waters, MP) and Petition from the residents of Germiston, Ekurhuleni metropolitan municipality calling on the Assembly to investigate the numerous power outages (submitted by Mr M Waters, MP)  (Announcement, Tablings and Committee Reports, 18 June 2020, p 167).
tso: Ku tekeriwa enhlokweni ka Xiviko xa Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya Mafumelo ya Nhlanganelo na Timhaka ta Ndhavuko hi mayelana na Phethixini yo huma eka vaaki va le Boksburg, masipala wa dorobankulu ra Ekurhuleni lava va rhambaka leswaku Huvo ya Rixaka yi lavisisa ku famba ka gezi ko hlaya (leyi tisiweke hi Tatana M Waters, Xirho xa Palamende) na Phethixini yo huma eka vaaki va le Germiston, masipala wa dorobankulu ra Ekurhuleni lava kombelaka leswaku Huvo ya Rixaka yi lavisisa ku famba ka gezi ko hlaya (leyi tisiweke hi Tatana M Waters, Xirho xa Palamende)  (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 18 Khotavuxika 2020, papilla ra 167).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs on Petition from the residents of Alberton, calling on the Assembly to investigate public participation and legislative compliance in the proposed housing development in Alberton (submitted by Mr D Bergman, MP) (Announcement, Tablings and Committee Reports, 18 June 2020, p 166).
tso: Ku tekeriwa enhlokweni ka Xiviko xa Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya Mafumelo ya Nhlanganelo na Timhaka ta Ndhavuko hi mayelana na Phethixini ya vaaki va le Alberton leyi rhambaka Huvo ya Rixaka ku lavisisa ku nghenelela ka vaaki na ku landzeleriwa ka nawu eka nhluvukiso wa tindlu lowu ringanyetiweke eAlberton (leyi tisiweke hi Tatana D Bergman, Xirho xa Palamende) (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 18 Khotavuxika 2020, papila ra 166).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs on Petition relating to Glen Marais Sub-Station Fire Incident under City of Ekurhuleni (Announcement, Tablings and Committee Reports, 18 June 2020, p 163).
tso: Ku tekeriwa enhlokweni ka Xiviko xa Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya Mafumelo ya Nhlanganelo na Timhaka ta Ndhavuko hi mayelana Phethixini leyi fambelanaka na Mhangu ya Nzilo eka Xitichintsongo xa Glen Marais ehansi ka dorobankulu ra Ekurhuleni (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 18 Khotavuxika 2020, papila ra 163).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs on Petition from the residents of Ward 37, Alberton North, Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the illegal occupation of stand 1/1224 number 42, Second Avenue, Alberton North (submitted by Mr D Bergman, MP) (Announcement, Tablings and Committee Reports, 18 June 2020, p 160).
tso: Ku tekeriwa enhlokweni ka Xiviko xa Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya Mafumelo ya Nhlanganelo na Timhaka ta Ndhavuko hi mayelana na Phethixini yo huma eka vaaki va le ka Wadi ya 37, N’walungu wa Alberton, Ekurhuleni leyi rhambaka Huvo ya Rixaka ku lavisisa ku tshama swi nga ri enawini eka xitandi ya 1/1224 xa nomboro ya 42, Second Avenue, N’walungu wa Alberton (leyi tisiweke hi Tatana D Bergman, Xirho xa Palamende) (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 18 Khotavuxika 2020, papila ra 160).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs on Petition pertaining to Service Delivery in Nemallpius Ext 22, under City of Tshwane (Announcement, Tablings and Committee Reports, 18 June 2020, p 157).
tso: Ku tekeriwa enhlokweni ka Xiviko xa Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya Mafumelo ya Nhlanganelo na Timhaka ta Ndhavuko hi mayelana na Phethixini leyi khumbhaka Mphakelo wa Vukorhokeri eNmalipius Ext 22 ehansi ka Dorobankulu ra Tshwane (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 18 Khotavuxika 2020, papila ra 157).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Basic Education on Petition from the residents of Dryharts village, calling on the Assembly to investigate the re-opening of the Molehabangwe Middle School (submitted by Mr I S Seitlholo, MP) (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 26 February 2020, p 38).
tso: Ku tekeriwa enhlokweni ka Xiviko xa Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya Dyondzo ya le Hansi hi mayelana na Phethixini yo huma eka vaaki va Muganga wa Dryharts lexi rhambaka Huvo ku lavisisa ku tlhela ku pfuriwa Xikolo xa le Xikarhi xa Molebabangwe lexi tisiweke hi tatana I S Seitlholo, Xirho xa Palamende (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 26 Nyenyankulu 2020, papila ra 38).

eng: FURTHER BUSINESS
tso: NTIRHO KU YISA EMAHLWENI

eng: ORDERS OF THE DAY:
tso: MINONGONOKO YA SIKU:

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Police on unsolicited Petition on Re-enlistment of former Police forum members into Police Service (Mr M Qongqo) (Announcement, Tablings and Committee Reports, 26 June 2020, p 20).
tso: Ku tekeriwa enhlokweni ka Xiviko xa Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Maphorisa mayelana na Phethixini leyi endliweke hi ku tinyikela ya mayelana na ku katsiwa ka khale ka swirho swa foramu ya Maphorisa eka Mitirho ya Maphorisa (Tatana M Qongqo) (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 26 Khotavuxika 2020, papila ra 20).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Police on Petition from the residents of Wattville, Benoni calling on the Assembly to address the escalation of crime, including gender-based violence and violence against children, and the need for a police station in their area (submitted by Ms H Ismail, MP) and Petition from the residents of Actonville, Benoni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the high crime rate and drugs, the provision of police kiosks and police vehicles in their area (submitted by Ms H Ismail, MP) (Announcement, Tablings and Committee Reports, 26 June 2020, p 15).
tso: Ku tekeriwa enhlokweni ka Xiviko xa Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Maphorisa mayelana na Phethixini yo suka eka vaaki va le Wattville, eBenoni lava rhambaka Huvo ya Rixaka ku languta vugevenga lebyi nga eku tlakukeni, ku katsa na madzolonga ya swa rimbewu na madozolonga eka vana, na ku laveka ka xitichi xa maphorisa endhawini ya ka vona (leyi tisiweke hi Manana H Ismail, Xirho xa Palamende) na Phethixini yo suka eka vaaki va le Actonville, eBenoni lava rhambaka Huvo ya Rixaka ku lavisisa xiyimo xa le henhla xa vugevenga na swidzidziharisi, vuphakeri bya switichitsongo swa maphorisa na mimovha ya maphorisa endhawini ya ka vona (leyi tisiweke hi Manana H Ismail, Xirho xa Palamende) (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 26 Khotavuxika 2020, papila ra 15).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Police on Petition of Mr Cornelius Basson (Announcement, Tablings and Committee Reports, 26 June 2020, p 10).
tso: Ku tekeriwa enhlokweni ka Xiviko xa Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Maphorisa mayelana na Petition of Mr Cornelius Basson (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 26 Khotavuxika 2020, papila ra 10).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Police on Application for Firearm Amnesty declaration (Announcement, Tablings and Committee Reports, 26 June 2020, p 9).
tso: Ku tekeriwa enhlokweni ka Xiviko xa Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Maphorisa mayelana na xitiviso xa Xikombelo xa Ndzivalelo wa Swibalesa (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 26 Khotavuxika 2020, papila ra 9).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Police on Petition from the residents of Kempton Park, calling on the Assembly to investigate chronic inadequate visible policing and shortage of vehicles at the Kempton Park police station (submitted by Mr M Waters, MP) (Announcement, Tablings and Committee Reports, 26 June 2020, p 4).
tso: Ku tekeriwa enhlokweni ka Xiviko xa Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Maphorisa mayelana na Phethixini yo suka eka vaaki va le Kempton Park lava rhamabaka Huvo ya Rixaka ku lavisisa ku kayivela ka vukona bya maphorisa hi ndlela leyi ringaneleke leswi nga heriki na ku pfumaleka ka mimovha exitichini xa maphorisa xa Kempton Park (leyi tisiweke hi Tatana M Waters, Xirho xa Palamende) (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 26 Khotavuxika 2020, papila ra 4).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Trade and Industry on Departments of Trade and Industry and of Economic Development’s fourth quarter financial and non-financial performance for 2019/20 financial year (Announcement, Tablings and Committee Reports, 25 June 2020, p 5).
tso: Ku tekeriwa enhlokweni ka Xiviko xa Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Mabindzu na Vumaki mayelana na matirhelo ya Ndzawulo ya Mabindzu na Vumaki na Ndzawulo ya Nhluvukiso wa Ikhonomi ya timali na yo ka ya nga ri ya timali ya kotara ya vumune ya lembeximali ra 2019/20 (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 25 Khotavuxika 2020, papila ra 5).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Trade and Industry on Oversight visit to Gauteng (Announcement, Tablings and Committee Reports, 23 June 2020, p 17).
tso: Ku tekeriwa enhlokweni ka Xiviko xa Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Mabindzu na Vumaki mayelana na Rendzo ro  Hoxa tihlo ra le Gauteng (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 23 Khotavuxika 2020, papila ra 17).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Trade and Industry on Oversight visit to Western Cape (Announcement, Tablings and Committee Reports, 23 June 2020, p 4).
tso: Ku tekeriwa enhlokweni ka Xiviko xa Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Mabindzu na Vumaki mayelana na Rendzo ro Hoxa tihlo ra le Western Cape (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 23 Khotavuxika 2020, papila ra 4).

eng: Consideration of Report of Joint Standing Committee on Defence on Letters from the President on Employment of South African National Defence Force in Mozambique Channel, Democratic Republic of Congo, to Wuhan City in Hubei Province of People’s Republic of China, and in support of South African Police Service and other State Departments (Announcement, Tablings and Committee Reports, 19 June 2020, p 3).
tso: Ku tekeriwa enhlokweni ka Xiviko xa Komiti ya Nkarhi Hinkwawo ya Nhlanganelo hi mayelana na ku yimeleriwa ka Mapapila yo huma eka president ya Ku Thoriwa ka Masocha yo Sirhelela Afrika-Dzonga eka Chanele ya Mozambique, Rhiphabliki ra Xidemokirasi ra Congo, Dorobankulu ra Wuhan eka Xifundzankulu xa Hubei, eka Dorobankulu ra Wuhan Rhiphabliki ra Vanhu ra China na ku seketeriwa hi Vukorhokeri bya Maphorisa ya Afrika-Dzonga na Tindzawulo tin’wana ta Mfumo (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 19 Khotavuxika 2020, papila ra 3).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Employment and Labour on Second Quarterly Report regarding performance of Department of Employment and Labour and entities in meeting strategic objectives for 2019/20 (Announcement, Tablings and Committee Reports, 18 June 2020, p 120).
tso: Ku tekeriwa enhlokweni ka Xiviko xa Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Vuthori na Vatirhi hi mayelana na Xiviko xa Kotara hi Kotara xa Vumbirhi xa matirhelo ya Ndzawulo ya swa Vuthori na Vatirhi na mihlangano ya yona eka ku fikelela swikongomelonkulu swa qhinga hi 2019/20 (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 18 Khotavuxika 2020, papila ra 120)

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Employment and Labour on First Quarterly Report regarding performance of Department of Employment and Labour and entities in meeting strategic objectives for 2019/20 (Announcement, Tablings and Committee Reports, 18 June 2020, p 81).
tso: Ku tekeriwa enhlokweni ka Xiviko xa Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Vuthori na vatirhi hi mayelana na Xiviko xa Kotara hi Kotara xo Sungula xa matirhelo ya Ndzawulo ya  eka ku fikelela swikongomelonkulu swa qhinga hi 2019/20 (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 18 Khotavuxika 2020, papila rap 81).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Employment and Labour on Third Quarterly Report regarding performance of Department of Employment and Labour and entities in meeting strategic objectives for 2018/19 (Announcement, Tablings and Committee Reports, 18 June 2020, p 12).
tso: Ku tekeriwa enhlokweni ka Xiviko xa Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Ntholo na vatirhi hi mayelana na Xiviko xa Kotara hi Kotara xa Vunharhu xa matirhelo ya Ndzawulo ya swa Vuthori na Vatirhi na mihlangano ya yona eka ku fikelela swikongomelonkulu swa qhinga hi 2018/19 (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 18 Khotavuxika 2020, papia ra 12).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Employment and Labour on Oversight visit to Compensation Fund Head-Quarters (Announcement, Tablings and Committee Reports, 18 June 2020, p 3).
tso: Ku tekeriwa enhlokweni ka Xiviko xa Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Vuthori na Vatirhi hi mayelana na rendzo ro Hoxa tihlo eka Hofisinkulu ya Nkwama wa Ndziriso (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 18 Khotavuxika 2020, papila 3).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Trade and Industry on Departments of Trade and Industry and of Economic Development’s Third Quarter Financial and Non-financial Performance for 2019/20 financial year (Announcement, Tablings and Committee Reports, 19 May 2020, p 3).
tso: Ku tekeriwa enhlokweni ka Xiviko xa Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Bindzu na Vumaki hi mayelana na Ndzawulo ya swa Bindzu na Vumaki na matirhelo ya swa timali na yo ka ya nga ri ya timali ya kotara ya vunharhu ya Ndzawulo ya swa Nhluvukiso wa Ikhonomi eka lembeximali ra 2019/20 (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 19 Mudyaxihi 2020, papila ra 3).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on International Relations and Cooperation on Oversight visit on pilot project for acquisition of office accommodation for South African Permanent Mission to United Nations and Consulate-General in New York, United States of America (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 16 March 2020, p 11).
tso: CKu tekeriwa enhlokweni ka Xiviko xa Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Vuxaka bya Matiko Misava na Timhaka ta Ndhavuko hi mayelana na rendzo ro angamela phurojeke yo ringeta ya makumelo ya ndhawu ya hofisi ya Mixini wa Nkarhi Hinkwawo ya Afrika-Dzonga eka Nhlangano wa Matiko na Khonsuleti-Jenerali eNew York, United States of America (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 16 Nyenyankulu 2020, papila 11).

eng: Decision of Question on Report of Portfolio Committee on Higher Education, Science and Technology on 2019/20 First Quarter financial and service delivery performance report of Department of Higher Education and Training (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 5 December 2019, p 64).
tso: Xiboho hi mayelana na Xiviko xa Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Dyondzo ya le Henhla, Sayense na Thekinoloji eka Swiviko hi mayelana na xiviko xa matirhelo ya swa timali xa kotara yo sungula na mphakelo wa vukorhokeri xa Dyondzo ya le Henhla na Vuleteri (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 5 N’wendzamhala 2019, papila ra 64).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee Public Service and Administration on Second and Third quarter performance of 2019/20 financial year: Department Public Service and Administration, Entities and Public Service Commission (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 11 March 2020, p 30).
tso: Ku tekeriwa enhlokweni ka Xiviko xa Komito ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Vukorhokeri bya Mfumo na Vulawuri eka Matirhelo ya Kotara ya Vumbirhi na ya Vunharhu ya lembeximali ra 2019/20: Ndzawulo ya Vukorhokeri bya Mfumo na Vulawuri, Minhlangano na Khomixini ya Mintirho ya Mfumo (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 11 Nyenyankulu 2020, papilla ra  30).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee Public Service and Administration on Second and Third quarter performance of 2019/20 financial year: Statistics South Africa (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 11 March 2020, p 23).
tso: Ku tekeriwa enhlokweni ka Xiviko xa Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Vukorhokeri bya Mfumo na Vulawuri eka Matirhelo ya Kotara ya Vumbirhi na ya Vunharhu ya lembeximali ra 2019/20: Tinhlayonhlayo ta Afrika-Dzonga (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 11 Nyenyankulu 2020, papila ra 23).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee Public Service and Administration on Second and Third quarter performance of 2019/20 financial year: Department of Planning, Monitoring and Evaluation and Brand South Africa (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 11 March 2020, p 15).
tso: Ku tekeriwa enhlokweni ka Xiviko xa Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Vukorhokeri bya Mfumo na Vulawuri eka Matirhelo ya kotara ya Vumbirhi na ya Vunharhu ya lembe ximali ra 2019/20: Ndzawulo yo Pulana, ku Kambisisa Matirhelo no Pima na Burende ya Afrika-Dzonga (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 11 Nyenyankulu 2020, papila ra 15).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Basic Education on oversight visit to Capricorn and Sekhukhune Education Districts, Limpopo Province (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 26 February 2020, p 6).
tso: Ku tekeriwa enhlokweni ka Xiviko xa Komiti Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Dyondzo ya le Hansi eka rendzo ro hoxa tihlo eka Swifundza swa Dyondzo swa Capricorn na Sekhukhune, Xifundzankulu xa Limpopo (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 26 Nyenyenyana 2020, papila ra 6).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Basic Education on Submission from the Griqua People’s Heritage on the lack of a Primary School (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 11 February 2020, p 5).
tso: Ku tekeriwa enhlokweni ka Xiviko xa Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Dyondzo ya le Hansi eka Swibumabumelo swo huma eka Ndzhaka ya Vanhu va le Griqua eka ku pfumaleka ka Xikolo xa le Purayimari (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 11 Nyenyenyana 2020, papila ra 5).

eng: Consideration of Report of Joint Standing Committee on Financial Management of Parliament on Parliament of Republic of South Africa’s performance in first quarter of 2019/20 (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 9 December 2019, p 20).
tso: Ku tekeriwa enhlokweni ka Xiviko xa Komiti Nkarhi Hinkwawo ya Nhlanganelo ya Mafambiselo ya Timali ta Palamende eka Matirhelo ya Palamende ya Riphabliki ra Afrika-Dzonga eka kotara yo sungula ya 2019/20 (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 9 N’wendzamhala 2019, papila ra 20).

eng: Consideration of Report of Joint Standing Committee on Financial Management of Parliament on Parliament of Republic of South Africa’s 2018/19 Annual Report (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 9 December 2019, p 5).
tso: Ku tekeriwa enhlokweni ka Xiviko xa Komiti ya Nkarhi Hinkwawo ya Nhlanganelo ya Mafambiselo ya Timali ta Palamende eka Xiviko xa Palamende ya Riphabliki ra Afrika-Dzonga xa Lembe ra 2019/20 (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 9 N’wendzamhala 2019, papila ra 5).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Higher Education, Science and Technology on 2018/19 Annual Reports of National Skills Fund and Sector Education and Training Authorities (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 5 December 2019, p 24).
tso: Ku tekeriwa enhlokweni ka Xiviko xa Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Dyondzo ya le Henhla, Sayense na Thekinoloji eka Swiviko swa Vulawuri bya Nkwama wa Swikili wa Rixaka na Dyondzo ya Xiyenge na Vuleteri swa Lembe ra 2018/19 (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 5 N’wendzamhala 2019, papila ra).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Trade and Industry on Departments of Trade and Industry and of Economic Development’s Second Quarter Financial and Non-financial Performance for 2019/20 financial year (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 5 December 2019, p 4).
tso: Ku tekeriwa enhlokweni ka Xiviko xa Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya Mabindzu na Vumaki ya swa Ndzawulo ya Mabindzu na Vumaki na ya Nhluvukiso wa Ikhonomi ya Kotara ya Vumbirhi xa Matirhelo ya Timali na yo ka ya nga ri ya Timali ya lembeximali ra 2019/20 (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 5 N’wendzamhala 2019, papila ra 4).

eng: Consideration of Report of Standing Committee on Auditor-General on Integrated Annual Report of Auditor-General for financial year 2018/19 (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 4 December 2019, p 3).
tso: Ku tekeriwa enhlokweni ka Xiviko xa Komiti ya Nkarhi Hinkwawo ya swa Mukambelatinkota eka Xiviko xa lembe lexi Hlanganisiweke xa Mukambelatinkotankulu xa lembe ximali ra 2018/19 (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 4 N’wendzamhala 2019, papila ra 3).

eng: APPENDIXES
tso: SWITANDZHAKU

eng: PETITIONS REFERRED TO COMMITTEES
tso: TIPHETHIXINI LETI HUNDZISERIWEKE EKA TIKOMITI

eng: Petition from the residents of the City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the chronic inadequate refuse removal services in their area (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
tso: Phethixini yo suka eka vaaki va le ka Dorobankulu ra le Ekurhuleni, lava rhambaka Huvo ya Rixaka ku lavisisa ku pfumaleka ka vukorhokeri byo rhwalela thyaka endhawini ya ka vona (Manana H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Mafumelo ya Ntirhisano na Timhaka ta Ndhavuko – Huvo ya Rixaka).

eng: Petition from the residents of Kokomeng and neighbouring villages, calling on the Assembly to investigate and prioritize the re-opening of the Kokomeng police station (Mr I S Seitlholo) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
tso: Phethixini yo suka vaaki va muganga wa le Kokomeng na miganga leyi akelaneke na wona lava rhamabaka Huvo ya Rixaka ku lavisisa na ku rhangisa emahlweni ku pfuriwa nakambe ka xitichi xa maphorisa xa le Kokomeng (Tatana I S Seitlholo) – (Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Maphorisa - Huvo ya Rixaka).

eng: Petition from the residents of Bredell, Pomona, Brentwood Park and Glen Marais (ward 25), City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the collapse of the reliable supply of electricity in their areas (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
tso: Phethixini yo suka eka vaaki va le Bredell, ePomona, Brentwood Park na le Glen Marais (wadi ya 25), Dorobankulu ra le Ekurhuleni, lava rhambaka Huvo ya Rixaka ku lavisisa ku wa ka mphakelo wo tshembheka wa gezi eka tindhawu ta ka vona (Manana H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Vuangameri ya huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Mafumelo ya Ntirhisano na Timhaka ta Ndhavuko – Huvo ya Rixaka).

eng: Petition from the residents of Actonville, Benoni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the high rentals paid by tenants of council-owned flats (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Human Settlements, Water and Sanitation – National Assembly).
tso: Phethixini ya vaaki va le Actonville, eBenoni, lava rhambaka Huvo ya Rixaka leswaku yi lavisisa tihakelo ta le henhla swinene ta rhente leti hakeriwaka hi vahiri va tifulete ta khansele (Manana H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Vuangameri ya huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Matshamelo ya Vanhu, Mati na Mbhasiso – Huvo ya Rixaka).

eng: INTERNATIONAL AGREEMENTS
tso: MITWANANO YA MATIKO YA MISAVA

eng: Agreement between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (ICGEB) on the Establishment of an International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (ICGEB) Component in the Republic of South Africa (Tabled on 18 September 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Higher Education, Science and Technology on 19 September 2019 - reported on 5 December 2019 – approved on 10 March 2020) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Education and Technology, Sports, Arts and Culture on 19 November 2019 – reported on 26 May 2020).
tso: Ntwanano exikarhi ka Mfumo wa Riphabliki ra Afrika-Dzonga na Senthara ya Matiko ya Tinxaka eka swa Vuinjhiniyere na  Bayotekinoloji (ICGEB) eka ku tumbuluxiwa ka Xiyenge xa Senthara ya Matiko ya Tinxaka ya Vuinjhiniyere bya Bayothekinoloji (ICGEB) eRiphabliki ra Afrika-Dzonga (Lowu andlariweke hi 18 Ndzati 2019) (NA: Lowu hundziseriweke eka Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya Dyondzo ya le Henhla, Sayense na Thekinoloji hi ti 19 Ndzati 2019 – lowu vikiweke hi ti 5 N’wendzamhala 2019 – lowu pasisiweke hi 10 Nyenyankulu 2020). (NCOP: Lowu hundziseriweke eka Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya Swifundzankulu ya swa Dyondzo na Thekinoloji, Mitlangu, Vutshila na Mfuwo hi ti 19 Hukuri 2019 – lowu vikiweke hi ti 26 Mudyaxihi 2020).

eng: Ratification of the Agreement between the Government of the Republic of India, the Government of the Federative Republic of Brazil and the Government of the Republic of South Africa on the IBSA Fund for the Alleviation of Poverty and Hunger (signed 17 October 2017) (Tabled on 18 October 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on International Relations and Cooperation on 22 October 2019) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 24 October 2019).
tso: Ku tiyisisiwa ka Ntwanano exikarhi ka Mfumo wa Riphabliki ra Indiya na Mfumo wa Federali wa Riphabliki ra Brazil na Mfumo wa Riphabliki ra Afrika-Dzonga hi mayelana na Nkwama wa IBSA wa ku Herisiwa ka Vusweti na Ndlala (Lowu sayiniweke hi ti 17 Nhlangula 2017) (Lowu andlariweke hi ti 18 Nhlangula 2019).  (NA: Lowu hundziseriweke eka Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Vuxaka bya Matiko na Ntirhisano hi ti 22 Nhlangula 2019).  (NCOP: Lowu hundziseriweke eka Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya Swifundzankulu ya swa Vusirheleri na Vululami hi ti 24 Nhlangula 2019).

eng: Agreement between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the European Atomic Energy Community (EURATOM) for Co-operation in the Peaceful Uses of Nuclear Energy (Tabled on 14 November 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Mineral Resources and Energy on 18 November 2019).
tso: Ntwanano exikarhi ka Mfumo wa Riphabliki ra Afrika-Dzonga na Mfumo wa Europian Atomic Energy Community (EURATOM) hi mayelana na ku Tirhisana eka ku Tirhisiwa ka Eneji ya Nyutliya hi ndlela yo Rhula (Lowu andlariweke hi ti 14 Hukuri 2019). (NA: Lowu hundziseriweke eka Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya Swipfuno swa Swicelwa na Eneji hi ti 18 Hukuri 2019).

eng: Treaty between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the Government of the United Mexican States on Mutual Legal Assistance in Criminal Matters (Tabled on 5 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Justice and Correctional Services on 9 March 2020 – reported on 29 May 2020 – approved on 17 June 2020) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 10 March 2020 – reported on 1 June 2020).
tso: Ntwanano exikarhi ka Mfumo wa Riphabliki ra Afrika-Dzonga na Mfumo wa United Mexican States mayelana na ku Pfunana hi swa Nawu eka Timhaka ta Vugevenga (Lowu andlariweke hi ti 5 Nyenyankulu 2020). (NA: Lowu hundziseriweke eka Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Vululami na Vukohokeri bya Makhostso hi ti 9 Nyenyankulu 2020). (NCOP: Lowu yisiweke eka Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya Swifundzankulu ya swa Vuhlayiseki na Vululami hi ti 10 Nyenyankulu 2020 – lowu vikiweke hi ti 1 Khotavuxika 2020).

eng: Treaty between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the Government of the United Mexican States on Extradition (Tabled on 5 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Justice and Correctional Services on 9 March 2020 – reported on 29 May 202 0– approved on 17 June 2020) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 10 March 2020 – reported on 1 June 2020).
tso: Ntwanano exikarhi ka Mfumo wa Riphabliki ra Afrika-Dzonga na Mfumo wa United Mexican States mayelana na ku Tlheriseriwa etikweni ra rikwavo ku ya langutana na nawu (Lowu andlariweke hi ti 5 Nyenyankulu 2020) (NA: Lowu hundziseriweke eka Komiti ya Vuangameri Ya Huvo y Rixaka ya swa Vululami na Vukorhokeri bya Makhotso hi ti 9 Nyenyankulu 2020) (NCOP: Lowu hundziseriweke eka Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya Swifundzankulu ya swa Vululami na Vukohokeri bya Makhotso hi ti 10 Nyenyankulu 2020 – lowu vikiweke hi ti 1 Khotavuxika 2020).

eng: African Charter on Statistics (Tabled on 5 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Public Service and Administration on 9 March 2020).
tso: Chatara ya Afrika ya swa Tinhlayohlayo (Leyi andlariweke hi ti 5 Nyenyankulu 2020) (NA: Leyi hundziseriweke eka Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Vukorhokeri bya Mfumo na Vulawuri hi ti 9 Nyenyankulu 2020).

eng: Treaty of Amity and Cooperation (TAC) in South East Asia (Tabled on 18 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on International Relations and Cooperation on 26 March 2020 – reported on 11 June 2020 – approved on 17 June 2020)(NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 29 June 2020) .
tso: Ntwanano wa Vuxaka na Ntirhisano (TAC) eDzongaVuxa bya Asia (Wu andlariwe hi ti 18 Nyenyankulu 2020) (Huvo ya Rixaka: Wu kongomisiwe eka Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya Vuxaka bya Matiko ya Misava na Ntirhisano hi ti 26 Nyenyankulu 2020).

eng: MOTIONS:
tso: TIMOXINI:

eng: Draft resolution (Chief Whip of the Majority Party): That the House –
tso: Xiboho xa mpfampfarhuto (Ximokonkulu xa Vandla leri fumaka): Leswaku Huvo –

eng: notes that the term of office of the Auditor-General is due to end on 30 November 2020;
tso: yi lemuka leswaku theme ya ntirho ya Oditara-Jenerali yi ta fika emakumu hi ti 30 Hukuri 2020;

eng: establishes in terms of Rule 253(1)(a) an ad hoc committee on the appointment of the Auditor-General, the Committee to –
tso: Komiti yi tmbuluxa komiti ya nkarhinyana hi ku ya hi Nawu wa 253(1)(a) hi mayelana na ku thoriwa ka Oditara-Jenerali –

eng: nominates a person in terms of section 193 of the Constitution for appointment as Auditor-General;
tso: yi langha munhu hi ku ya hi xiyenge xa 193 xa Vumbiwa eka ku thoriwa tanihi Oditara-Jenerali;

eng: consist of 11 members of the National Assembly, as follows: ANC 6, DA 2, EFF 1, and other parties 2;
tso: yi vumbiwa hi swirho swa 11 swa Huvo ya Rixaka hi ndlela leyi landzelaka: ANC 6, DA 2, EFF 1 na mavandla man’wana 2;

eng: exercise those powers in Rule 167 necessary to assist it in carrying out its task; and
tso: taskyi tirha ntirho wa yona eka Nawu wa 167 lama faneleke ku yi pfuneta ku tirha ntirho wa yona; na

eng: report to the House on the nomination of the Auditor-General by 31 August 2020.
tso: ku vikela huvo eka ku langhiwa ka Oditara-Jenerali ku nga se hundza ti Mhawuri 20202.

eng: Draft resolution (Chief Whip of the Majority Party): That the House, notwithstanding Rule 138(2), which provides for rotation of clusters for Questions to Ministers on a weekly basis as determined by the Rules Committee, mandates the National Assembly Programme Committee to make decisions regarding the combination of clusters of government portfolios and the rotation of clusters based on the determination of priorities as and when necessary for the duration of the 2020 annual session.
tso: Xiboho xa mpfampfarhuto (Ximokonkulu xa Vandla leri fumaka): Leswaku Huvo yi nga tsan’wi Nawu wa 138(2) lowu lulamiselakaku cincacincana ka mitlawa eka Swivutiso eka Vaholobye vhiki hi vhiki tanihilaha swi bohiweke hakona hi Komiti yo Endla Milawu, yi nyika Komiti uvo ya Rixaka ku endla swiboho leswi khumbaka mpfanganyiso wa mitlawa ya tokomiti tavuangameri ta mfumo na ku cincacincana ka mitlawa hi ku ya hi mabohele ya swirhangana hi ku ya hi loko swi fanerile eka nkarhi wa sexini ya lembe na lembe ya 2020.

eng: ORDERS OF THE DAY:
tso: MINONGONOKO YA SIKU:

eng: Consideration of First Report of National Assembly Rules Committee, 2020 (Virtual Meetings) (Announcement, Tablings and Committee Reports, 2 June 2020, p 3).
tso: Ku tekeriwa enhlokweni ka Xiviko xo Sungula xa Komiti yo Endla Milawu ya Huvo ya Rixaka, 2020 (Tinhlengeletano leti khomeriwakahi ku tirhisa tipulatifomo ta le ka inthanete) (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 2 Khotavuxika 2020, papila ra 3).

eng: Consideration of Recommendation of candidates to fill six vacancies on Council of Independent Communications Authority of South Africa (Icasa) (Report of Portfolio Committee on Communications, see Announcement, Tablings and Committee Reports, 5 June 2020, p 3).
tso: Ku tekeriwa enhlokeeni ka Swibumabumelo swa vayimelakulangwa vo siva swivandla swa ntlhanu eka Khansele ya Nhlangano wa swa Vuhlanganisi yo Tiyimela ya Afrika-Dzonga (ICASA) (Xiviko xa Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Vuhlanganisi, vona Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 5 Khotavuxika 2020, papila ra 3).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Social Development on Social Assistance Amendment Bill [B 8 – 2018] (National Assembly – sec 76) (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 19 March 2020, p 10).
tso: Ku tekeriwa enhlokweni ka Xiviko xa Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya Nhluvukiso wa Vaaki hi mayelana na Nawumbisi wo Cinca Mpfuneto wa Vaaki wa [B 8 – 2018] (Huvo ya Rixaka– xiyenge xa 76) – (Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Nhluvukiso wa Vaaki – Huvo ya Rixaka – xiyenge xa 76) (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 19 Nyenyankulu 2020, papila ra 10).

eng: Second Reading – Social Assistance Amendment Bill [B 8B – 2018] (National Assembly – sec 76) – (Minister of Social Development).
tso: Ku hlayiwa ravumbirhi –Nawumbisi wo Cinca Mpfuneto wa Vaaki [B 8B – 2018] (Huvo ya Rixaka – xiyenge xa 76) – (Holobye wa swa Nhluvukiso wa Vaaki).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Justice and Correctional Services on Prescription in Civil and Criminal Matters (Sexual Offences) Amendment Bill [B 22 - 2019] (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 11 March 2020, p 11).
tso: Ku tekeriwa enhlokweni ka Xiviko xa Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Vululami na Vukorhokeri bya Makhotso eka Nawumbisi wo Cinca Swileriso eka Timhaka ta Vaaki na Vugevenga (Milandzu ya swa Masangu) wa [B 22B - 2019] (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 11 Nyenyankulu 2020, paplia ra 11).

eng: Second Reading – Prescription in Civil and Criminal Matters (Sexual Offences) Amendment Bill [B 22B - 2019] (National Assembly – sec 75) - (Minister of Justice and Correctional Services).
tso: Ku hlayiwa ravumbirhi – Nawumbisi wo Cinca Swileriso eka Timhaka ta Vaaki na Vugevenga (Milandzu ya swa Masangu) wa [B 22B– 2019] (Huvo ya Rixaka – xiyenge xa 76) – (Holobye wa swa Vululami na Vukorhokeri bya Makhotso).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Justice and Correctional Services on Recognition of Customary Marriages Amendment Bill [B 12  2019] (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 11 March 2020, p 8).
tso: Ku tekeriwa enhlokweni ka Xiviko xa Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Vululami na Vukorhokeri bya Makhotso eka Nawumbisi wo Cinca Vukati bya Ndhavuko wa [B 12  2019] (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 11 Nyenyankulu 2020, papila ra 8). Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 11 March 2020, p 8).

eng: Second Reading – Recognition of Customary Marriages Amendment Bill [B 12  2019] (National Assembly – sec 76) – (Minister of Justice and Correctional Services).
tso: Ku hlayiwa ravumbirhi – Nawumbisi wo Cinca Vukati bya Ndhavuko wa [B 12 – 2019] (Huvo ya Rixaka – xiyenge xa 76) – (Holobye wa swa Vululami na Vukorhokeri bya Makhotso).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on International Relations and Cooperation on Budget Vote 6: International Relations and Cooperation (Announcement, Tablings and Committee Reports, 3 June 2020, p 102).
tso: Ku tekeriwa enhlokweni ka Xiviko xa Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya Vuxaka bya Matiko ya Misava na Ntirhisano hi mayelana na Vhoti ya Mpimanyeto ya 6: Vuxaka bya Matiko ya Misava na Ntirhisano Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti 3 Khotavuxika 2020, papila ra 102).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Police on 2020/21 Budget, Annual Performance Plan and 2020-2025 Strategic Plan of Private Security Industry Regulatory Authority (PSIRA) (Announcement, Tablings and Committee Reports, 3 June 2020, p 85).
tso: Ku tekeriwa enhlokweni ka Xiviko xa Komiti ya swa Maphorisa hi mayelana na Mpimanyeto wa 2020-2025, Kungu ra Matirhelo ra Lembe na Lembe na Kungu ra Qhinga ra Nhlangano wo Lawula Indhasitiri ya Vusirheleri Lebyi nga riki bya Mfumo (PRISA) ra 2020-2025 (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 3 Khotavuxika 2020, papila ra 85).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Police on 2020/21 Budget Vote 24, Performance Plan and 2020 -2025 Strategic Plan of Independent Police Investigative Directorate (IPID) (Announcement, Tablings and Committee Reports, 3 June 2020, p 62).
tso: Ku tekeriwa enhlokweni ka Xiviko xa Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Maphorisa hi mayelana na Vhoti ya Mimanyeto ya 24, Kungu ra Matirhelo na Kungu ra Qhinga ra Nhlangano wo Lavisisa Maphorisa Lowu Tiyimeleke (IPID) ra 2020-2025(Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 3 Khotavuxika2020, papila ra 62).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Police on 2020/21 Budget, Annual Performance Plan of Civilian Secretariat for Police Services (CSPS) Vote 21 (Announcement, Tablings and Committee Reports, 3 June 2020, p 37).
tso: Ku tekeriwa enhlokweni ka Xiviko xa Komiti ya Vuangameri ya swa Maphorisa hi mayelana na Mpimanyeto wa 2020/21, Vhoti ya 21 ya Kungu ra matirhelo ra Lembe na lembe ra Hofisi ya Vamatsalana vo Korhokela vaaki eka Vukorhokeri bya Maphorisa (CSPS) (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 3 Khotavuxika 2020, papila ra 37).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Police on 2020/21 Budget Vote 28, Annual Performance Plan of Department of Police (SAPS) (Announcement, Tablings and Committee Reports, 3 June 2020, p 4).
tso: Ku tekeriwa enhlokweni ka Xiviko xa Komiti ya Vuangameri ya swa Maphorisa hi mayelana na Vhoti ya Mpimanyeto ya 28 ya 2020/21, Kungu ra Matirhelo ra Lembe na lembe ra ndzawulo ya swa Maphorisa (SAPS) (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 3 Khotavuxika 2020, papila ra 4).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Sport, Arts and Culture on Budget Vote 37: Sport, Arts and Culture (Announcement, Tablings and Committee Reports, 4 June 2020, p 563).
tso: Ku tekeriwa enhlokweni ka Xiviko xa Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa mintlangu, Vutshila na Mfuwo hi mayelana na Vhoti ya Mpimanyeto ya 37: Mintlangu, Vutshila na Mfuwo (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 4 Khotavuxika 2020, p 563).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Human Settlements, Water and Sanitation on Budget Vote 33: Human Settlements, Strategic Plan for Medium Term Expenditure Framework (MTEF) period and Annual Performance Plan 2020/21 (Announcement, Tablings and Committee Reports, 4 June 2020, p 543).
tso: Ku tekeriwa enhlokweni ka Xiviko xa Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Matshamelo ya Vanhu, Mati na Mbhasiso hi mayelana na Vhoti ya Mpimanyeto ya 33: Matshamelo ya Vanhu, nkarhi wa Kungu ra Qhinga ra Matirhelo ra Rimba ra Matirhiselo ya mali ra Themexikarhi (MTEF) na Kungu ra Matirhelo ra Lembe na Lembe ra 2020/21 (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 4 Khotavuxika 2020, p 543).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Health on Budget Vote 18: Health, Strategic Plan and Annual Performance Plan of Department of Health (Announcement, Tablings and Committee Reports, 4 June 2020, p 517).

tso: Ku tekeriwa enhlokweni ka Xiviko xa Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya Dyondzo ya le Hansi hi mayelana na Phethixini yo huma eka vaaki va Muganga wa Dryharts lexi rhambaka Huvo ku lavisisa ku tlhela ku pfuriwa Xikolo xa le Xikarhi xa Molebabangwe lexi tisiweke hi tatana I S Seitlholo, Xirho xa Palamende (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 26 Nyenyankulu 2020, papila ra 38).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Basic Education on oversight visit to Capricorn and Sekhukhune Education Districts, Limpopo Province (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 26 February 2020, p 6).
tso: Ku tekeriwa enhlokweni ka Xiviko xa Komiti Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Dyondzo ya le Hansi eka rendzo ro hoxa tihlo eka Swifundza swa Dyondzo swa Capricorn na Sekhukhune, Xifundzankulu xa Limpopo (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 26 Nyenyenyana 2020, papila ra 6).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Basic Education on Submission from the Griqua People’s Heritage on the lack of a Primary School (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 11 February 2020, p 5).
tso: Ku tekeriwa enhlokweni ka Xiviko xa Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Dyondzo ya le Hansi eka Swibumabumelo swo huma eka Ndzhaka ya Vanhu va le Griqua eka ku pfumaleka ka Xikolo xa le Purayimari (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 11 Nyenyenyana 2020, papila ra 5).

eng: Consideration of Report of Joint Standing Committee on Financial Management of Parliament on Parliament of Republic of South Africa’s performance in first quarter of 2019/20 (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 9 December 2019, p 20).
tso: Ku tekeriwa enhlokweni ka Xiviko xa Komiti Nkarhi Hinkwawo ya Nhlanganelo ya Mafambiselo ya Timali ta Palamende eka Matirhelo ya Palamende ya Riphabliki ra Afrika-Dzonga eka kotara yo sungula ya 2019/20 (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 9 N’wendzamhala 2019, papila ra 20).

eng: Consideration of Report of Joint Standing Committee on Financial Management of Parliament on Parliament of Republic of South Africa’s 2018/19 Annual Report (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 9 December 2019, p 5).
tso: Ku tekeriwa enhlokweni ka Xiviko xa Komiti ya Nkarhi Hinkwawo ya Nhlanganelo ya Mafambiselo ya Timali ta Palamende eka Xiviko xa Palamende ya Riphabliki ra Afrika-Dzonga xa Lembe ra 2019/20 (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 9 N’wendzamhala 2019, papila ra 5).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Higher Education, Science and Technology on 2018/19 Annual Reports of National Skills Fund and Sector Education and Training Authorities (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 5 December 2019, p 24).
tso: . Ku tekeriwa enhlokweni ka Xiviko xa Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Dyondzo ya le Henhla, Sayense na Thekinoloji eka Swiviko swa Vulawuri bya Nkwama wa Swikili wa Rixaka na Dyondzo ya Xiyenge na Vuleteri swa Lembe ra 2018/19 (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 5 N’wendzamhala 2019, papila ra 24).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Trade and Industry on Departments of Trade and Industry and of Economic Development’s Second Quarter Financial and Non-financial Performance for 2019/20 financial year (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 5 December 2019, p 4).
tso: Ku tekeriwa enhlokweni ka Xiviko xa Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya Mabindzu na Vumaki ya swa Ndzawulo ya Mabindzu na Vumaki na ya Nhluvukiso wa Ikhonomi ya Kotara ya Vumbirhi xa Matirhelo ya Timali na yo ka ya nga ri ya Timali ya lembeximali ra 2019/20 (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 5 N’wendzamhala 2019, papila ra 4).

eng: Consideration of Report of Standing Committee on Auditor-General on Integrated Annual Report of Auditor-General for financial year 2018/19 (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 4 December 2019, p 3).
tso: Ku tekeriwa enhlokweni ka Xiviko xa Komiti ya Nkarhi Hinkwawo ya swa Mukambelatinkota eka Xiviko xa lembe lexi Hlanganisiweke xa Mukambelatinkotankulu xa lembe ximali ra 2018/19 (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 4 N’wendzamhala 2019, papila ra 3).

eng: APPENDIXES
tso: SWITANDZHAKU

eng: PETITIONS REFERRED TO COMMITTEES
tso: TIPHETHIXINI LETI HUNDZISERIWEKE EKA TIKOMITI

eng: Petition from the residents of Germiston, Ekurhuleni metropolitan municipality calling on the Assembly to investigate the numerous power outages (Mr M Waters) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
tso: Phethixini yo suka eka vaaki va le Germiston, masipala wa dorobankulu ra Ekurhuleni lava rhambaka Huvo ya Rixaka ku lavisisa ku timeka ka gezi ko hlaya (Tatana M Waters) – (Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Mafumele ya Ntirhisano na Timhaka ta Ndhavuko – Huvo ya Rixaka).

eng: Petition from the residents of Boksburg, Ekurhuleni metropolitan municipality, calling on the Assembly to investigate the numerous power outages (Mr M Waters) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
tso: Phethixini yo suka eka vaaki va le Germiston, masipala wa dorobankulu ra Ekurhuleni lava rhambaka Huvo ya Rixaka ku lavisisa ku timeka ka gezi ko hlaya (Tatana M Waters) – (Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Mafumele ya Ntirhisano na Timhaka ta Ndhavuko – Huvo ya Rixaka).

eng: Petition from the residents of Kempton Park, calling on the Assembly to investigate chronic inadequate visible policing and shortage of vehicles at the Kempton Park police station (Mr M Waters) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
tso: Phethixini yo suka eka vaaki va le Kempton Park lava rhamabaka Huvo ya Rixaka ku lavisisa ku kayivela ka vukona bya maphorisa hi ndlela leyi ringaneleke leswi nga heriki na ku pfumaleka ka mimovha exitichini xa maphorisa xa Kempton Park (Tatana M Waters) – Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Maphorisa – Huvo ya Rixaka).

eng: Petition from the residents of Alberton, calling on the Assembly to investigate public participation and legislative compliance in the proposed housing development in Alberton (Mr D Bergman) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
tso: Phethixini ya ya vaaki va le ka Wadi ya 37, eAlberton North, Ekurhuleni, lava rhambaka Huvo ya Rixaka ku lavisisa ku tshama loku nga riki enawini eka xitandi xa /1224 xa nomboro ya 42, Second Avenue, Alberton North (Tatana D Bergman) – (Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Mafumelo ya Ntirhisano na Timhaka ta Ndhavuko na Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya Mafumelo ya Ntirhisano na Timhaka ta Ndhavuko Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Maphorisa – Huvo ya Rixaka).

eng: Petition from the residents of Wattville, Benoni calling on the Assembly to address the escalation of crime, including gender-based violence and violence against children, and the need for a police station in their area (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
tso: Phethixini yo suka eka vaaki va le Wattville, eBenoni lava rhambaka Huvo ya Rixaka ku languta vugevenga lebyi nga eku tlakukeni, ku katsa na madzolonga ya swa rimbewu na madozolonga eka vana, na ku laveka ka xitichi xa maphorisa endhawini ya ka vona (Manana H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Maphorisa – Huvo ya Rixaka).

eng: Petition from the residents of Actonville, Benoni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the high crime rate and drugs, the provision of police kiosks and police vehicles in their area (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
tso: Phethixini yo suka eka vaaki va le Actonville, eBenoni lava rhambaka Huvo ya Rixaka ku lavisisa xiyimo xa le henhla xa vugevenga na swidzidziharisi, vuphakeri bya switichitsongo swa maphorisa na timovha ta maphorisa endhawini ya ka vona (Manana H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Maphorisa – Huvo ya Rixaka).

eng: Petition from the residents of the City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the chronic inadequate refuse removal services in their area (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
tso: Phethixini yo suka eka vaaki va le ka Dorobankulu ra le Ekurhuleni, lava rhambaka Huvo ya Rixaka ku lavisisa ku pfumaleka ka vukorhokeri byo rhwalela thyaka endhawini ya ka vona (Manana H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Mafumelo ya Ntirhisano na Timhaka ta Ndhavuko – Huvo ya Rixaka).

eng: Petition from the residents of Kokomeng and neighbouring villages, calling on the Assembly to investigate and prioritize the re-opening of the Kokomeng police station (Mr I S Seitlholo) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
tso: Phethixini yo suka vaaki va muganga wa le Kokomeng na miganga leyi akelaneke na wona lava rhamabaka Huvo ya Rixaka ku lavisisa na ku rhangisa emahlweni ku pfuriwa nakambe ka xitichi xa maphorisa xa le Kokomeng (Tatana I S Seitlholo) – (Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Maphorisa - Huvo ya Rixaka).

eng: Petition from the residents of Bredell, Pomona, Brentwood Park and Glen Marais (ward 25), City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the collapse of the reliable supply of electricity in their areas (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
tso: Phethixini yo suka eka vaaki va le Bredell, ePomona, Brentwood Park na le Glen Marais (wadi ya 25), Dorobankulu ra le Ekurhuleni, lava rhambaka Huvo ya Rixaka ku lavisisa ku wa ka mphakelo wo tshembheka wa gezi eka tindhawu ta ka vona (Manana H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Vuangameri ya huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Mafumelo ya Ntirhisano na Timhaka ta Ndhavuko – Huvo ya Rixaka).

eng: Petition from the residents of Actonville, Benoni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the high rentals paid by tenants of council-owned flats (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Human Settlements, Water and Sanitation – National Assembly).
tso: Phethixini ya vaaki va le Actonville, eBenoni, lava rhambaka Huvo ya Rixaka leswaku yi lavisisa tihakelo ta le henhla swinene ta rhente leti hakeriwaka hi vahiri va tifulete ta khansele (Manana H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Vuangameri ya huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Matshamelo ya Vanhu, Mati na Mbhasiso – Huvo ya Rixaka).

eng: Petition from the residents of Ward 37, Alberton North, Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the illegal occupation of stand 1/1224 number 42, Second Avenue, Alberton North (Mr D Bergman) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs and Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
tso: 11. Phethixini ya ya vaaki va le ka Wadi ya 37, eAlberton North, Ekurhuleni, lava rhambaka Huvo ya Rixaka ku lavisisa ku tshama loku nga riki enawini eka xitandi xa /1224 xa nomboro ya 42, Second Avenue, Alberton North (Tatana D Bergman) – (Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Mafumelo ya Ntirhisano na Timhaka ta Ndhavuko na Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya Mafumelo ya Ntirhisano na Timhaka ta Maphorisa -  Huvo ya Rixaka).

eng: INTERNATIONAL AGREEMENTS
tso: MITWANANO YA MATIKO YA MISAVA

eng: Agreement between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (ICGEB) on the Establishment of an International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (ICGEB) Component in the Republic of South Africa (Tabled on 18 September 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Higher Education, Science and Technology on 19 September 2019 - reported on 5 December 2019 – approved on 10 March 2020) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Education and Technology, Sports, Arts and Culture on 19 November 2019 – reported on 26 May 2020).
tso: Ntwanano exikarhi ka Mfumo wa Riphabliki ra Afrika-Dzonga na Senthara ya Matiko ya Tinxaka eka swa Vuinjhiniyere na  Bayotekinoloji (ICGEB) eka ku tumbuluxiwa ka Xiyenge xa Senthara ya Matiko ya Tinxaka ya Vuinjhiniyere bya Bayothekinoloji (ICGEB) eRiphabliki ra Afrika-Dzonga (Lowu andlariweke hi 18 Ndzati 2019) (NA: Lowu hundziseriweke eka Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya Dyondzo ya le Henhla, Sayense na Thekinoloji hi ti 19 Ndzati 2019 – lowu vikiweke hi ti 5 N’wendzamhala 2019 – lowu pasisiweke hi 10 Nyenyankulu 2020). (NCOP: Lowu hundziseriweke eka Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya Swifundzankulu ya swa Dyondzo na Thekinoloji, Mitlangu, Vutshila na Mfuwo hi ti 19 Hukuri 2019 – lowu vikiweke hi ti 26 Mudyaxihi 2020).

eng: Ratification of the Agreement between the Government of the Republic of India, the Government of the Federative Republic of Brazil and the Government of the Republic of South Africa on the IBSA Fund for the Alleviation of Poverty and Hunger (signed 17 October 2017) (Tabled on 18 October 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on International Relations and Cooperation on 22 October 2019) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 24 October 2019).
tso: Ku tiyisisiwa ka Ntwanano exikarhi ka Mfumo wa Riphabliki ra Indiya na Mfumo wa Federali wa Riphabliki ra Brazil na Mfumo wa Riphabliki ra Afrika-Dzonga hi mayelana na Nkwama wa IBSA wa ku Herisiwa ka Vusweti na Ndlala (Lowu sayiniweke hi ti 17 Nhlangula 2017) (Lowu andlariweke hi ti 18 Nhlangula 2019).  (NA: Lowu hundziseriweke eka Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Vuxaka bya Matiko na Ntirhisano hi ti 22 Nhlangula 2019).  (NCOP: Lowu hundziseriweke eka Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya Swifundzankulu ya swa Vusirheleri na Vululami hi ti 24 Nhlangula 2019).

eng: Treaty between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the Government of the Republic of Bangladesh on Extradition (Tabled on 14 November 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Justice and Correctional Services on 18 November 2019 – reported on 3 March 2020 - approved on 10 March 2020) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 30 January 2020 – reported on 17 March 2020).
tso: Ntwanano exikarhi ka Mfumo wa Riphabliki ra Afrika-Dzonga na Mfumo wa Riphabliki ra Bangladesh hi mayelana na ku Tlheriseriwa etikweni ra rikwavo ku ya langutana na nawu (Lowu andlariweke hi ti 14 Hukuri 2019) (NA: Lowu hundziseriweke eka Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Vululami na Vukorhokeri bya Makhotso hi ti 18 Hukuri 2019 – lowu vikiweke hi ti 3 Nyenyankulu 2020 – lowu pasisiweke hi 10 Nyenyankulu 2020) (NCOP: Lowu hundziseriweke eka Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya Swifundzankulu ya swa Vuhlayiseki na Vululami hi ti 30 Sunguti 2020 – lowu vikiweke hi ti 17 Nyenyankulu 2020).

eng: Treaty between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the Government of the Republic of Bangladesh on Mutual Legal Assistance in Criminal Matters (Tabled on 14 November 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Justice and Correctional Services on 18 November 2019 – reported on 3 March 2020 - approved on 10 March 2020) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 30 January 2020 – reported on 17 March 2020).
tso: Ntwanano exikarhi ka Mfumo wa Riphabliki ra Afrika-Dzonga na Mfumo wa Riphabliki ra Bangladesh hi mayelana na ku Pfunana hi swa Nawu eka Timhaka ta Vugevenga (Lowu andlariweke hi ti 14 Hukuri 2019) (NA: Lowu hundziseriweke eka Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Vululami na Vukorhokeri bya Makhotso hi ti 18 Hukuri 2019 – lowu vikiweke hi ti 3 Nyenyankulu 2020 – lowu pasisiweke hi 10 Nyenyankulu 2020) (NCOP: Lowu hundziseriweke eka Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya Swifundzankulu ya swa Vuhlayiseki na Vululami hi ti 30 Sunguti 2020 – lowu vikiweke hi ti 17 Nyenyankulu 2020).

eng: Agreement between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the European Atomic Energy Community (EURATOM) for Co-operation in the Peaceful Uses of Nuclear Energy (Tabled on 14 November 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Mineral Resources and Energy on 18 November 2019).
tso: Ntwanano exikarhi ka Mfumo wa Riphabliki ra Afrika-Dzonga na Mfumo wa Europian Atomic Energy Community (EURATOM) hi mayelana na ku Tirhisana eka ku Tirhisiwa ka Eneji ya Nyutliya hi ndlela yo Rhula (Lowu andlariweke hi ti 14 Hukuri 2019). (NA: Lowu hundziseriweke eka Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya Swipfuno swa Swicelwa na Eneji hi ti 18 Hukuri 2019).

eng: Treaty between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the Government of the United Mexican States on Mutual Legal Assistance in Criminal Matters (Tabled on 5 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Justice and Correctional Services on 9 March 2020 – reported on 29 May 2020) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 10 March 2020 – reported on 1 June 2020).
tso: Ntwanano exikarhi ka Mfumo wa Riphabliki ra Afrika-Dzonga na Mfumo wa United Mexican States mayelana na ku Pfunana hi swa Nawu eka Timhaka ta Vugevenga (Lowu andlariweke hi ti 5 Nyenyankulu 2020). (NA: Lowu hundziseriweke eka Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Vululami na Vukohokeri bya Makhostso hi ti 9 Nyenyankulu 2020). (NCOP: Lowu yisiweke eka Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya Swifundzankulu ya swa Vuhlayiseki na Vululami hi ti 10 Nyenyankulu 2020 – lowu vikiweke hi ti 1 Khotavuxika 2020).

eng: Treaty between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the Government of the United Mexican States on Extradition (Tabled on 5 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Justice and Correctional Services on 9 March 2020 – reported on 29 May 2020) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 10 March 2020 – reported on 1 June 2020).
tso: Ntwanano exikarhi ka Mfumo wa Riphabliki ra Afrika-Dzonga na Mfumo wa United Mexican States mayelana na ku Tlheriseriwa etikweni ra rikwavo ku ya langutana na nawu (Lowu andlariweke hi ti 5 Nyenyankulu 2020) (NA: Lowu hundziseriweke eka Komiti ya Vuangameri Ya Huvo y Rixaka ya swa Vululami na Vukorhokeri bya Makhotso hi ti 9 Nyenyankulu 2020) (NCOP: Lowu hundziseriweke eka Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya Swifundzankulu ya swa Vululami na Vukohokeri bya Makhotso hi ti 10 Nyenyankulu 2020 – lowu vikiweke hi ti 1 Khotavuxika 2020).

eng: African Charter on Statistics (Tabled on 5 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Public Service and Administration on 9 March 2020).
tso: Chatara ya Afrika ya swa Tinhlayohlayo (Leyi andlariweke hi ti 5 Nyenyankulu 2020) (NA: Leyi hundziseriweke eka Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Vukorhokeri bya Mfumo na Vulawuri hi ti 9 Nyenyankulu 2020).

eng: Treaty of Amity and Cooperation (TAC) in South East Asia (Tabled on 18 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on International Relations and Cooperation on 26 March 2020).
tso: Ntwanano wa Vuxaka na Ntirhisano (TAC) eDzongaVuxa bya Asia (Wu andlariwe hi ti 18 Nyenyankulu 2020) (Huvo ya Rixaka: Wu kongomisiwe eka Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya Vuxaka bya Matiko ya Misava na Ntirhisano hi ti 26 Nyenyankulu 2020).
