eng: ORDERS OF THE DAY:
tso: MINONGONOKO YA SIKU:

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Justice and Correctional Services on Notices determining remuneration of Public Protector and Commissioners of South African Human Rights Commission with effect from 1 April 2019 (Announcement, Tablings and Committee Reports, 22 June 2020, p 15).
tso: Ku tekeriwa enhlokweni ka Xiviko xa Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Vululami na Vukorhokeri bya Makhotso hi mayelana na switiviso leswi bohaka ku hakeriwa ka Murirheleri wa vaakitiko na Vakhomixinara wa Khomixini ya swa Timfanelo ta Ximunhu ya Afrika-Dzonga kusukela hi ti 1 Dzivamisoko 2019 (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 22 Khotavuxika 2020, papila ra 15).

eng: Consideration of Report of Joint Standing Committee on Defence on Letters from the President on Employment of South African National Defence Force in Mozambique Channel, Democratic Republic of Congo, to Wuhan City in Hubei Province of People’s Republic of China, and in support of South African Police Service and other State Departments (Announcement, Tablings and Committee Reports, 19 June 2020, p 3).
tso: Ku tekeriwa enhlokweni ka Xiviko xa Komiti ya Nkarhi Hinkwawo ya Nhlanganelo hi mayelana na ku yimeleriwa ka Mapapila yo huma eka president ya Ku Thoriwa ka Masocha yo Sirhelela Afrika-Dzonga eka Chanele ya Mozambique, Rhiphabliki ra Xidemokirasi ra Congo, Dorobankulu ra Wuhan eka Xifundzankulu xa Hubei, eka Dorobankulu ra Wuhan Rhiphabliki ra Vanhu ra China na ku seketeriwa hi Vukorhokeri bya Maphorisa ya Afrika-Dzonga na Tindzawulo tin’wana ta Mfumo (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 19 Khotavuxika 2020, papila ra 3).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs on Petition from the residents of Boksburg, Ekurhuleni metropolitan municipality, calling on the Assembly to investigate the numerous power outages (submitted by Mr M Waters, MP) and Petition from the residents of Germiston, Ekurhuleni metropolitan municipality calling on the Assembly to investigate the numerous power outages (submitted by Mr M Waters, MP)  (Announcement, Tablings and Committee Reports, 18 June 2020, p 167).
tso: Ku tekeriwa enhlokweni ka Xiviko xa Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya Mafumelo ya Nhlanganelo na Timhaka ta Ndhavuko hi mayelana na Phethixini yo huma eka vaaki va le Boksburg, masipala wa dorobankulu ra Ekurhuleni lava va kombelaka leswaku Huvo ya Rixaka yi lavisisa ku famba ka gezi ko hlaya (yi tisiwile hi Tatana M Waters, Xirho xa Palamende) (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 18 Khotavuxika 2020, papila ra 167).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs on Petition from the residents of Alberton, calling on the Assembly to investigate public participation and legislative compliance in the proposed housing development in Alberton (submitted by Mr D Bergman, MP) (Announcement, Tablings and Committee Reports, 18 June 2020, p 166).
tso: Ku tekeriwa enhlokweni ka Xiviko xa Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya Mafumelo ya Nhlanganelo na Timhaka ta Ndhavuko hi mayelana na Phethixini ya vaaki va le Alberton leyi kombelaka Huvo ya Rixaka ku lavisisa ku nghenelea ka vaaki na ku landzeleriwa ka nawu eka nhluvukiso wa tindlu lowu ringanyetiweke eAlberton (yi tisiwile hi Tatana D Bergman, Xirho xa Palamende) (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 18 Khotavuxika 2020, papila ra 166).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs on Petition relating to Glen Marais Sub-Station Fire Incident under City of Ekurhuleni (Announcement, Tablings and Committee Reports, 18 June 2020, p 163).
tso: Ku tekeriwa enhlokweni ka Xiviko xa Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya Mafumelo ya Nhlanganelo na Timhaka ta Ndhavuko hi mayelana Phethixini leyi fambelanaka na mhangu ya le xitichinintsongo xa swa Ndzilo xa Glen Marais ehansi ka dorobankulu ra Ekurhuleni (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 18 Khotavuxika 2020, papila ra 163).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs on Petition from the residents of Ward 37, Alberton North, Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the illegal occupation of stand 1/1224 number 42, Second Avenue, Alberton North (submitted by Mr D Bergman, MP) (Announcement, Tablings and Committee Reports, 18 June 2020, p 160).
tso: Ku tekeriwa enhlokweni ka Xiviko xa Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya Mafumelo ya Nhlanganelo na Timhaka ta Ndhavuko hi mayelana na Phethixini yo huma eka vaaki va le ka Wadi ya 37, N’walungu wa Alberton, Ekurhuleni leyi kombelaka Huvo ya Rixaka ku lavisisa ku tshama swi nga ri enawini eka xitandi ya 1/1224 xa nomboro ya 42, Second Avenue, N’walungu wa Alberton (yi tisiwile hi Tatana D Bergman, Xirho xa Palamende) (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 18 Khotavuxika 2020, papila ra 160).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs on Petition pertaining to Service Delivery in Nemallpius Ext 22, under City of Tshwane (Announcement, Tablings and Committee Reports, 18 June 2020, p 157).
tso: Ku tekeriwa enhlokweni ka Xiviko xa Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya Mafumelo ya Nhlanganelo na Timhaka ta Ndhavuko hi mayelana na Phethixini leyi khumbhaka mphakelo wa vukorhokeri eNmalipius Ext 22 ehansi ka dorobankulu ra Tshwane (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 18 Khotavuxika 2020, papila ra 157).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Employment and Labour on Second Quarterly Report regarding performance of Department of Employment and Labour and entities in meeting strategic objectives for 2019/20 (Announcement, Tablings and Committee Reports, 18 June 2020, p 120).
tso: Ku tekeriwa enhlokweni ka Xiviko xa Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Ntholo na Mitirho hi mayelana na Xiviko xa Kotara hi Kotara xa Vumbirhi xa matirhelo ya Ndzawulo ya swa Ntholo na Vatirhi na mihlangano eka ku fikelela swikongomelonkulu swa qhinga hi 2019/20 (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 18 Khotavuxika 2020, papila ra 120).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Employment and Labour on First Quarterly Report regarding performance of Department of Employment and Labour and entities in meeting strategic objectives for 2019/20 (Announcement, Tablings and Committee Reports, 18 June 2020, p 81).
tso: Ku tekeriwa enhlokweni ka Xiviko xa Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Ntholo na vatirhi hi mayelana na Xiviko xa Kotara hi Kotara xo Sungula xa matirhelo ya Ndzawulo ya  eka ku fikelela swikongomelonkulu swa qhinga hi 2019/20 (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 18 Khotavuxika 2020, papila ra 81).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Employment and Labour on Third Quarterly Report regarding performance of Department of Employment and Labour and entities in meeting strategic objectives for 2018/19 (Announcement, Tablings and Committee Reports, 18 June 2020, p 12).
tso: Ku tekeriwa enhlokweni ka Xiviko xa Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Ntholo na vatirhi hi mayelana na Xiviko xa Kotara hi Kotara xa Vunharhu xa matirhelo ya Ndzawulo ya swa Ntholo na Vatirhi eka ku fikelela swikongomelonkulu swa qhinga hi 2018/19 (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 18 Khotavuxika 2020, papia ra 12).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Employment and Labour on Oversight visit to Compensation Fund Head-Quarters (Announcement, Tablings and Committee Reports, 18 June 2020, p 3).
tso: Ku tekeriwa enhlokweni ka Xiviko xa Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Ntholo na Vatirhi hi mayelana na rendzo ro angamela eka hofisinkulu ya Nkwama wa Ndziriso (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 18 Khotavuxika 2020, papila ra 3).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Trade and Industry on Departments of Trade and Industry and of Economic Development’s Third Quarter Financial and Non-financial Performance for 2019/20 financial year (Announcement, Tablings and Committee Reports, 19 May 2020, p 3).
tso: Ku tekeriwa enhlokweni ka Xiviko xa Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Bindzu na Vumaki hi mayelana na Ndzawulo ya swa Bindzu na Vumaki na matirhelo ya swa timali na yo ka ya nga ri ya timali ya kotara ya vunharhu ya Ndzawulo ya swa Nhluvukiso wa Ikhonomi eka lembeximali ra 2019/20 (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 19 Mudyaxihi 2020, papila ra 3).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on International Relations and Cooperation on Oversight visit on pilot project for acquisition of office accommodation for South African Permanent Mission to United Nations and Consulate-General in New York, United States of America (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 16 March 2020, p 11).
tso: Ku tekeriwa enhlokweni ka Xiviko xa Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Vuxaka bya Matiko Misava na Timhaka ta Ndhavuko hi mayelana na rendzo ro angamela phurojeke yo ringeta ya makumelo ya ndhawu ya hofisi ya Mixini wa Nkarhi Hinkwawo ya Afrika-Dzonga eka Nhlangano wa Matiko na Khonsuleti-Jenerali eNew York, United States of America (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 16 Nyenyankulu 2020, papila ra 11).

eng: Decision of Question on Report of Portfolio Committee on Higher Education, Science and Technology on 2019/20 First Quarter financial and service delivery performance report of Department of Higher Education and Training (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 5 December 2019, p 64).
tso: Xiboho hi mayelana na Xiviko xa Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Dyondzo ya le Henhla, Sayense na Thekinoloji eka Swiviko hi mayelana na xiviko xa matirhelo ya swa timali xa kotara yo sungula na mphakelo wa vukorhokeri xa Dyondzo ya le Henhla na Vuleteri (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 5 N’wendzamhala 2019, papila ra 64).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee Public Service and Administration on Second and Third quarter performance of 2019/20 financial year: Department Public Service and Administration, Entities and Public Service Commission (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 11 March 2020, p 30).
tso: Ku tekeriwa enhlokweni ka Xiviko xa Komito ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Vukorhokeri bya Mfumo na Vulawuri eka Matirhelo ya Kotara ya Vumbirhi na ya Vunharhu ya lembeximali ra 2019/20: Ndzawulo ya Vukorhokeri bya Mfumo na Vulawuri, Minhlangano na Khomixini ya Mintirho ya Mfumo (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 11 Nyenyankulu 2020, papila ra 30).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee Public Service and Administration on Second and Third quarter performance of 2019/20 financial year: Statistics South Africa (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 11 March 2020, p 23).
tso: . Ku tekeriwa enhlokweni ka Xiviko xa Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Vukorhokeri bya Mfumo na Vulawuri eka Matirhelo ya Kotara ya Vumbirhi na ya Vunharhu ya lembeximali ra 2019/20: Tinhlayonhlayo ta Afrika-Dzonga (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 11 Nyenyankulu 2020, papila ra 23)

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee Public Service and Administration on Second and Third quarter performance of 2019/20 financial year: Department of Planning, Monitoring and Evaluation and Brand South Africa (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 11 March 2020, p 15).
tso: Ku tekeriwa enhlokweni ka Xiviko xa Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Vukorhokeri bya Mfumo na Vulawuri eka Matirhelo ya kotara ya Vumbirhi na ya Vunharhu ya lembe ximali ra 2019/20: Ndzawulo yo Pulana, ku Kambisisa Matirhelo no Pima na Burende ya Afrika-Dzonga (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 11 Nyenyankulu 2020, papila ra 15).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Basic Education on Petition from the residents of Dryharts village, calling on the Assembly to investigate the re-opening of the Molehabangwe Middle School, submitted by Mr I S Seitlholo, MP (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 26 February 2020, p 38).
tso: Ku tekeriwa enhlokweni ka Xiviko xa Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya Dyondzo ya le Hansi hi mayelana na Phethixini yo huma eka vaaki va Muganga wa Dryharts lexi rhambaka Huvo ku lavisisa ku tlhela ku pfuriwa Xikolo xa le Xikarhi xa Molebabangwe lexi tisiweke hi tatana I S Seitlholo, Xirho xa Palamende (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 26 Nyenyankulu 2020, papila ra 38).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Basic Education on oversight visit to Capricorn and Sekhukhune Education Districts, Limpopo Province (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 26 February 2020, p 6).
tso: Ku tekeriwa enhlokweni ka Xiviko xa Komiti Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Dyondzo ya le Hansi eka rendzo ro hoxa tihlo eka Swifundza swa Dyondzo swa Capricorn na Sekhukhune, Xifundzankulu xa Limpopo (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 26 Nyenyenyana 2020, papila ra 6).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Basic Education on Submission from the Griqua People’s Heritage on the lack of a Primary School (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 11 February 2020, p 5).
tso: Ku tekeriwa enhlokweni ka Xiviko xa Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Dyondzo ya le Hansi eka Swibumabumelo swo huma eka Ndzhaka ya Vanhu va le Griqua eka ku pfumaleka ka Xikolo xa le Purayimari (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 11 Nyenyenyana 2020, papila ra 5).

eng: Consideration of Report of Joint Standing Committee on Financial Management of Parliament on Parliament of Republic of South Africa’s performance in first quarter of 2019/20 (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 9 December 2019, p 20).
tso: Ku tekeriwa enhlokweni ka Xiviko xa Komiti Nkarhi Hinkwawo ya Nhlanganelo ya Mafambiselo ya Timali ta Palamende eka Matirhelo ya Palamende ya Riphabliki ra Afrika-Dzonga eka kotara yo sungula ya 2019/20 (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 9 N’wendzamhala 2019, papila ra 20).

eng: Consideration of Report of Joint Standing Committee on Financial Management of Parliament on Parliament of Republic of South Africa’s 2018/19 Annual Report (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 9 December 2019, p 5).
tso: Ku tekeriwa enhlokweni ka Xiviko xa Komiti ya Nkarhi Hinkwawo ya Nhlanganelo ya Mafambiselo ya Timali ta Palamende eka Xiviko xa Palamende ya Riphabliki ra Afrika-Dzonga xa Lembe ra 2019/20 (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 9 N’wendzamhala 2019, papila ra 5).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Higher Education, Science and Technology on 2018/19 Annual Reports of National Skills Fund and Sector Education and Training Authorities (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 5 December 2019, p 24).
tso: Ku tekeriwa enhlokweni ka Xiviko xa Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Dyondzo ya le Henhla, Sayense na Thekinoloji eka Swiviko swa Vulawuri bya Nkwama wa Swikili wa Rixaka na Dyondzo ya Xiyenge na Vuleteri swa Lembe ra 2018/19 (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 5 N’wendzamhala 2019, papila ra 24).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Trade and Industry on Departments of Trade and Industry and of Economic Development’s Second Quarter Financial and Non-financial Performance for 2019/20 financial year (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 5 December 2019, p 4).
tso: Ku tekeriwa enhlokweni ka Xiviko xa Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya Mabindzu na Vumaki ya swa Ndzawulo ya Mabindzu na Vumaki na ya Nhluvukiso wa Ikhonomi ya Kotara ya Vumbirhi xa Matirhelo ya Timali na yo ka ya nga ri ya Timali ya lembeximali ra 2019/20 (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 5 N’wendzamhala 2019, papila ra 4).

eng: Consideration of Report of Standing Committee on Auditor-General on Integrated Annual Report of Auditor-General for financial year 2018/19 (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 4 December 2019, p 3).
tso: Ku tekeriwa enhlokweni ka Xiviko xa Komiti ya Nkarhi Hinkwawo ya swa Mukambelatinkota eka Xiviko xa lembe lexi Hlanganisiweke xa Mukambelatinkotankulu xa lembe ximali ra 2018/19 (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 4 N’wendzamhala 2019, papila ra 3).

eng: MOTIONS (Notice given previously):
tso: TIMOXINI (Xitiviso lexi nyikiweke eka nkarhi lowu nga hundza):

eng: See p 94-96 (Ms R C Adams, Mr S Ngcobo, Ms M S Khawula, Ms N G Adoons, Mr S L Ngcobo, Ms T Breedt, Ms T Mgweba, Mr W M Thring, Mr N L S Kwankwa, Mr M L Shelembe, Mrs E N Ntlangwini, Ms F A Masiko, Mr S H Mbuyane, Ms A S Hlongo, M.Gen O S Terblanche, Mr M G E Hendricks, Mr T S Mpanza, Mr P P Keetse, Ms R C Adams).
tso: Vona paila ra 94-96 (Manana R C Adams, Tatana S Ngcobo, Manana M S Khawula, Manana N G Adoons, TatanaS L Ngcobo, Manana T Breedt, Manana T Mgweba, Tatana W M Thring, Tatana N L S Kwankwa, Tatana M L Shelembe, Manana E N Ntlangwini, Manana F A Masiko, Tatana S H Mbuyane, Manana A S Hlongo, Jeneralinkulu O S Terblanche, TatanaM G E Hendricks, Tatana T S Mpanza, Tatana P P Keetse, Manana R C Adams).

eng: APPENDIXES
tso: SWITANDZHAKU

eng: PETITIONS REFERRED TO COMMITTEES
tso: TIPHETHIXINI LETI HUNDZISERIWEKE EKA TIKOMITI

eng: Petition from the residents of Kempton Park, calling on the Assembly to investigate chronic inadequate visible policing and shortage of vehicles at the Kempton Park police station (Mr M Waters) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
tso: Phethixini yo suka eka vaaki va le Kempton Park lava rhamabaka Huvo ya Rixaka ku lavisisa ku kayivela ka vukona bya maphorisa hi ndlela leyi ringaneleke leswi nga heriki na ku pfumaleka ka mimovha exitichini xa maphorisa xa Kempton Park (Tatana M Waters) – Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Maphorisa – Huvo ya Rixaka).

eng: Petition from the residents of Wattville, Benoni calling on the Assembly to address the escalation of crime, including gender-based violence and violence against children, and the need for a police station in their area (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
tso: Phethixini yo suka eka vaaki va le Wattville, eBenoni lava rhambaka Huvo ya Rixaka ku languta vugevenga lebyi nga eku tlakukeni, ku katsa na madzolonga ya swa rimbewu na madozolonga eka vana, na ku laveka ka xitichi xa maphorisa endhawini ya ka vona (Manana H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Maphorisa – Huvo ya Rixaka).

eng: Petition from the residents of Actonville, Benoni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the high crime rate and drugs, the provision of police kiosks and police vehicles in their area (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
tso: Phethixini yo suka eka vaaki va le Actonville, eBenoni lava rhambaka Huvo ya Rixaka ku lavisisa xiyimo xa le henhla xa vugevenga na swidzidziharisi, vuphakeri bya switichitsongo swa maphorisa na timovha ta maphorisa endhawini ya ka vona (Manana H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Maphorisa – Huvo ya Rixaka).

eng: Petition from the residents of the City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the chronic inadequate refuse removal services in their area (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
tso: Phethixini yo suka eka vaaki va le ka Dorobankulu ra le Ekurhuleni, lava rhambaka Huvo ya Rixaka ku lavisisa ku pfumaleka ka vukorhokeri byo rhwalela thyaka endhawini ya ka vona (Manana H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Mafumelo ya Ntirhisano na Timhaka ta Ndhavuko – Huvo ya Rixaka).

eng: Petition from the residents of Kokomeng and neighbouring villages, calling on the Assembly to investigate and prioritize the re-opening of the Kokomeng police station (Mr I S Seitlholo) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
tso: Phethixini yo suka vaaki va muganga wa le Kokomeng na miganga leyi akelaneke na wona lava rhamabaka Huvo ya Rixaka ku lavisisa na ku rhangisa emahlweni ku pfuriwa nakambe ka xitichi xa maphorisa xa le Kokomeng (Tatana I S Seitlholo) – (Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Maphorisa - Huvo ya Rixaka).

eng: Petition from the residents of Bredell, Pomona, Brentwood Park and Glen Marais (ward 25), City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the collapse of the reliable supply of electricity in their areas (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
tso: Phethixini yo suka eka vaaki va le Bredell, ePomona, Brentwood Park na le Glen Marais (wadi ya 25), Dorobankulu ra le Ekurhuleni, lava rhambaka Huvo ya Rixaka ku lavisisa ku wa ka mphakelo wo tshembheka wa gezi eka tindhawu ta ka vona (Manana H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Vuangameri ya huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Mafumelo ya Ntirhisano na Timhaka ta Ndhavuko – Huvo ya Rixaka).

eng: Petition from the residents of Actonville, Benoni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the high rentals paid by tenants of council-owned flats (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Human Settlements, Water and Sanitation – National Assembly).
tso: Phethixini ya vaaki va le Actonville, eBenoni, lava rhambaka Huvo ya Rixaka leswaku yi lavisisa tihakelo ta le henhla swinene ta rhente leti hakeriwaka hi vahiri va tifulete ta khansele (Manana H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Vuangameri ya huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Matshamelo ya Vanhu, Mati na Mbhasiso – Huvo ya Rixaka).

eng: BILLS REFERRED TO JOINT TAGGING MECHANISM (JTM)
tso: MILAWUMBISI LEYI HUNDZISERIWEKE EKA NDLELA YO FUNGHA YA NHLANGANELO (JTM)

tso: Nawumbisi wo Cinca Ku Antswisiwa ka Timfanelo ta Vun’wini bya Misava wa [B 6 – 2020] (Huvo ya Rixaka – xiyenge xa 76 lexi ringanyetiweke).

eng: INTERNATIONAL AGREEMENTS
tso: MITWANANO YA MATIKO YA MISAVA

eng: Agreement between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (ICGEB) on the Establishment of an International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (ICGEB) Component in the Republic of South Africa (Tabled on 18 September 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Higher Education, Science and Technology on 19 September 2019 - reported on 5 December 2019 – approved on 10 March 2020) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Education and Technology, Sports, Arts and Culture on 19 November 2019 – reported on 26 May 2020).
tso: Ntwanano exikarhi ka Mfumo wa Riphabliki ra Afrika-Dzonga na Senthara ya Matiko ya Tinxaka eka swa Vuinjhiniyere na  Bayotekinoloji (ICGEB) eka ku tumbuluxiwa ka Xiyenge xa Senthara ya Matiko ya Tinxaka ya Vuinjhiniyere bya Bayothekinoloji (ICGEB) eRiphabliki ra Afrika-Dzonga (Lowu andlariweke hi 18 Ndzati 2019) (NA: Lowu hundziseriweke eka Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya Dyondzo ya le Henhla, Sayense na Thekinoloji hi ti 19 Ndzati 2019 – lowu vikiweke hi ti 5 N’wendzamhala 2019 – lowu pasisiweke hi 10 Nyenyankulu 2020). (NCOP: Lowu hundziseriweke eka Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya Swifundzankulu ya swa Dyondzo na Thekinoloji, Mitlangu, Vutshila na Mfuwo hi ti 19 Hukuri 2019 – lowu vikiweke hi ti 26 Mudyaxihi 2020).

eng: Ratification of the Agreement between the Government of the Republic of India, the Government of the Federative Republic of Brazil and the Government of the Republic of South Africa on the IBSA Fund for the Alleviation of Poverty and Hunger (signed 17 October 2017) (Tabled on 18 October 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on International Relations and Cooperation on 22 October 2019) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 24 October 2019).
tso: Ku tiyisisiwa ka Ntwanano exikarhi ka Mfumo wa Riphabliki ra Indiya na Mfumo wa Federali wa Riphabliki ra Brazil na Mfumo wa Riphabliki ra Afrika-Dzonga hi mayelana na Nkwama wa IBSA wa ku Herisiwa ka Vusweti na Ndlala (Lowu sayiniweke hi ti 17 Nhlangula 2017) (Lowu andlariweke hi ti 18 Nhlangula 2019).  (NA: Lowu hundziseriweke eka Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Vuxaka bya Matiko na Ntirhisano hi ti 22 Nhlangula 2019).  (NCOP: Lowu hundziseriweke eka Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya Swifundzankulu ya swa Vusirheleri na Vululami hi ti 24 Nhlangula 2019).

eng: Agreement between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the European Atomic Energy Community (EURATOM) for Co-operation in the Peaceful Uses of Nuclear Energy (Tabled on 14 November 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Mineral Resources and Energy on 18 November 2019).
tso: Ntwanano exikarhi ka Mfumo wa Riphabliki ra Afrika-Dzonga na Mfumo wa Europian Atomic Energy Community (EURATOM) hi mayelana na ku Tirhisana eka ku Tirhisiwa ka Eneji ya Nyutliya hi ndlela yo Rhula (Lowu andlariweke hi ti 14 Hukuri 2019). (NA: Lowu hundziseriweke eka Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya Swipfuno swa Swicelwa na Eneji hi ti 18 Hukuri 2019).

eng: Treaty between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the Government of the United Mexican States on Mutual Legal Assistance in Criminal Matters (Tabled on 5 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Justice and Correctional Services on 9 March 2020 – reported on 29 May 2020 – approved on 17 June 2020) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 10 March 2020 – reported on 1 June 2020).
tso: Ntwanano exikarhi ka Mfumo wa Riphabliki ra Afrika-Dzonga na Mfumo wa United Mexican States mayelana na ku Pfunana hi swa Nawu eka Timhaka ta Vugevenga (Lowu andlariweke hi ti 5 Nyenyankulu 2020). (NA: Lowu hundziseriweke eka Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Vululami na Vukohokeri bya Makhostso hi ti 9 Nyenyankulu 2020). (NCOP: Lowu yisiweke eka Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya Swifundzankulu ya swa Vuhlayiseki na Vululami hi ti 10 Nyenyankulu 2020 – lowu vikiweke hi ti 1 Khotavuxika 2020).

eng: Treaty between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the Government of the United Mexican States on Extradition (Tabled on 5 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Justice and Correctional Services on 9 March 2020 – reported on 29 May 202 0– approved on 17 June 2020) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 10 March 2020 – reported on 1 June 2020).
tso: Ntwanano exikarhi ka Mfumo wa Riphabliki ra Afrika-Dzonga na Mfumo wa United Mexican States mayelana na ku Tlheriseriwa etikweni ra rikwavo ku ya langutana na nawu (Lowu andlariweke hi ti 5 Nyenyankulu 2020) (NA: Lowu hundziseriweke eka Komiti ya Vuangameri Ya Huvo y Rixaka ya swa Vululami na Vukorhokeri bya Makhotso hi ti 9 Nyenyankulu 2020) (NCOP: Lowu hundziseriweke eka Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya Swifundzankulu ya swa Vululami na Vukohokeri bya Makhotso hi ti 10 Nyenyankulu 2020 – lowu vikiweke hi ti 1 Khotavuxika 2020).

eng: African Charter on Statistics (Tabled on 5 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Public Service and Administration on 9 March 2020).
tso: Chatara ya Afrika ya swa Tinhlayohlayo (Leyi andlariweke hi ti 5 Nyenyankulu 2020) (NA: Leyi hundziseriweke eka Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Vukorhokeri bya Mfumo na Vulawuri hi ti 9 Nyenyankulu 2020).

eng: Treaty of Amity and Cooperation (TAC) in South East Asia (Tabled on 18 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on International Relations and Cooperation on 26 March 2020 – reported on 11 June 2020 – approved on 17 June 2020).
tso: Ntwanano wa Vuxaka na Ntirhisano (TAC) eDzongaVuxa bya Asia (Wu andlariwe hi ti 18 Nyenyankulu 2020) (Huvo ya Rixaka: Wu kongomisiwe eka Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya Vuxaka bya Matiko ya Misava na Ntirhisano hi ti 26 Nyenyankulu 2020).

eng: ORDERS OF THE DAY:

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Women, Youth and Persons with Disabilities on Strategic Plan (2020-2025) and Annual Performance Plan (Budget Vote 20) of Department of Women, Youth and Persons with Disabilities, Commission for Gender Equality and National Youth Development Agency for financial year 2020/21 (Announcement, Tablings and Committee Reports, 9 June 2020, p 72).
tso: Ku tekeriwa enhlokweni ka Xiviko xa Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya Vamanana, Vantshwa na Vatsoniwa hi mayelana na Kungu ra Qhinga ra (2020-2025) na Kungu ra Matirhelo ya Lembe na Lembe (Vhoti ya Mpimanyeto ya 20) ya Ndzawulo ya Vamanana, Vantshwa na Vatsoniwa, Khomixini ya Ndzingano wa Rimbewu na Ejensi ya Nhluvukiso wa Vantshwa ya Rixaka eka lembeximali ra 2020/21 (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 9 Khotavuxika 2020, papila ra 72).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Home Affairs on Strategic and Annual Performance Plans and Budget of Vote 5 - Department of Home Affairs, Electoral Commission and Government Printing Works (Announcement, Tablings and Committee Reports, 10 June 2020, p 4).
tso: Ku tekeriwa enhlokweni ka Xiviko xa Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Timhakata Xikaya hi mayelana na Makungu ya Qhinga na Matirhelo ya Lembe na Lembe ya na Vhoti ya Mpimanyeto ya 5 – Ndzawulo ya swa Timhaka ta Xikaya, Khomixini ya swa Nhlawulo na Mitirho ya Mfumo ya Nkandziyiso (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 10 Khotavuxika 2020, papila ra 4).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Defence and Military Veterans on Budget Vote 23 Defence and Military Veterans (Announcement, Tablings and Committee Reports, 9 June 2020, p 40).
tso: Ku tekeriwa enhlokweni ka Xiviko xa Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Vusirheleri na Tinhenha ta Nyimpi hi mayelana na Vhoti ya Mpimanyeto ya 23 ya swa Vusirheleri na Tinhenha ta Nyimpi (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti 9 Khotavuxika 2020, papila ra 40).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Tourism on Budget Vote No 38: Tourism (Announcement, Tablings and Committee Reports, 8 June 2020, p 3).
tso: Ku tekeriwa enhlokweni ka Xiviko xa Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Vupfhumba hi mayelana na Vhoti ya Mpimanyeto ya 38: Swa Vupfhumba (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 8 Khotavuxika 2020, p 3).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Trade and Industry on Budget Vote 39: Trade, Industry and Competition (Announcement, Tablings and Committee Reports, 8 June 2020, p 97).
tso: Ku tekeriwa enhlokweni ka Xiviko xa Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka yaswa Bindzu na Vumaki hi mayelana na Vhoti ya Mpimanyeto ya 39: Swa Bindzu, Vumaki na Mphikizano (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 8 Khotavuxika 2020, papila ra 97).

eng: Consideration of Report of Standing Committee on Appropriations on Appropriation Bill [B 4 – 2020] (Announcement, Tablings and Committee Reports, 9 June 2020, p 3).
tso: Ku tekeriwa enhlokweni ka Xiviko xa Komiti ya Nkarhi Hinkwawo ya Mikavelo ya Timali ta Tiko hi mayelana na Nawumbisi wa Mikavelo ya Timali ta Tiko wa [B 4 – 2020] (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 9 Khotavuxika 2020, papila ra 3).

eng: MINISTERIAL STATEMENT:
tso: XITATIMENDE XA HOLOBYE

eng: Statement by the Minister of Health on COVID-19.
tso: Xitatimende xa Holobye wa Rihanyu mayelana na COVID-19.

eng: ORDERS OF THE DAY:
tso: MINONGONOKO YA SIKU:

eng: Consideration of Report of Standing Committee on Finance on Revised Fiscal Framework and Revenue Proposals for 2020-2021 (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 7 July 2020, p 4).
tso: Ku tekeriwa rnhlokweni ka Xiviko xa Komiti ya Nkarhi Hinkwawo ya swa Timali mayelana na Rimba ra swa Timali leri Pfuxetiweke na Swiringanyeto swa Timali ta Tiko swa 2020-2021 (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 7 Mawuwani 2020, papila ra 4)

eng: FURTHER BUSINESS
tso: NTIRHO KU YISA EMAHLWENI

eng: ORDERS OF THE DAY:
tso: MINONGONOKO YA SIKU:

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Police on Unsolicited petition on Re-enlistment of former Police forum members into Police Service (Mr M Qongqo) (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 26 June 2020, p 20).
tso: Ku tekeriwa enhlokweni ka Xiviko xa Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Maphorisa mayelana na Phethixini leyi endliweke hi ku tinyikela ya mayelana na ku katsiwa ka khale ka swirho swa foramu ya Maphorisa eka Mitirho ya Maphorisa (Tatana M Qongqo) (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 26 Khotavuxika 2020, papila ra 20).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Police on Petition from the residents of Wattville, Benoni calling on the Assembly to address the escalation of crime, including gender-based violence and violence against children, and the need for a police station in their area (submitted by Ms H Ismail, MP) and Petition from the residents of Actonville, Benoni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the high crime rate and drugs, the provision of police kiosks and police vehicles in their area (submitted by Ms H Ismail, MP) (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 26 June 2020, p 15).
tso: Ku tekeriwa enhlokweni ka Xiviko xa Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Maphorisa mayelana na Phethixini yo suka eka vaaki va le Wattville, eBenoni lava rhambaka Huvo ya Rixaka ku languta vugevenga lebyi nga eku tlakukeni, ku katsa na madzolonga ya swa rimbewu na madozolonga eka vana, na ku laveka ka xitichi xa maphorisa endhawini ya ka vona (leyi tisiweke hi Manana H Ismail, Xirho xa Palamende) na Phethixini yo suka eka vaaki va le Actonville, eBenoni lava rhambaka Huvo ya Rixaka ku lavisisa xiyimo xa le henhla xa vugevenga na swidzidziharisi, vuphakeri bya switichitsongo swa maphorisa na mimovha ya maphorisa endhawini ya ka vona (leyi tisiweke hi Manana H Ismail, Xirho xa Palamende) (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 26 Khotavuxika 2020, papila ra 15).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Police on Petition of Mr Cornelius Basson (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 26 June 2020, p 10).
tso: Ku tekeriwa enhlokweni ka Xiviko xa Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Maphorisa mayelana na Petition of Mr Cornelius Basson (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 26 Khotavuxika 2020, papila ra 10).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Police on Application for Firearm Amnesty declaration (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 26 June 2020, p 9).
tso: Ku tekeriwa enhlokweni ka Xiviko xa Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Maphorisa mayelana na xitiviso xa Xikombelo xa Ndzivalelo wa Swibalesa (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 26 Khotavuxika 2020, papila ra 9).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Police on Petition from the residents of Kempton Park, calling on the Assembly to investigate chronic inadequate visible policing and shortage of vehicles at the Kempton Park police station (submitted by Mr M Waters, MP) (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 26 June 2020, p 4).
tso: Ku tekeriwa enhlokweni ka Xiviko xa Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Maphorisa mayelana na Phethixini yo suka eka vaaki va le Kempton Park lava rhamabaka Huvo ya Rixaka ku lavisisa ku kayivela ka vukona bya maphorisa hi ndlela leyi ringaneleke leswi nga heriki na ku pfumaleka ka mimovha exitichini xa maphorisa xa Kempton Park (leyi tisiweke hi Tatana M Waters, Xirho xa Palamende) (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 26 Khotavuxika 2020, papila ra 4).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Trade and Industry on Departments of Trade and Industry and of Economic Development’s fourth quarter financial and non-financial performance for 2019/20 financial year (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 25 June 2020, p 5).
tso: Ku tekeriwa enhlokweni ka Xiviko xa Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Mabindzu na Vumaki mayelana na matirhelo ya Ndzawulo ya Mabindzu na Vumaki na Ndzawulo ya Nhluvukiso wa Ikhonomi ya timali na yo ka ya nga ri ya timali ya kotara ya vumune ya lembeximali ra 2019/20 (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 25 Khotavuxika 2020, papila ra 5).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Trade and Industry on Oversight visit to Gauteng (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 23 June 2020, p 17).
tso: Ku tekeriwa enhlokweni ka Xiviko xa Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Mabindzu na Vumaki mayelana na Rendzo ro Hoxa tihlo ra le Gauteng (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 23 Khotavuxika 2020, papila ra 17).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Trade and Industry on Oversight visit to Western Cape (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 23 June 2020, p 4).
tso: Ku tekeriwa enhlokweni ka Xiviko xa Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Mabindzu na Vumaki mayelana na Rendzo ro Hoxa tihlo ra le Western Cape (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 23 Khotavuxika 2020, papila ra 4).

eng: Consideration of Report of Joint Standing Committee on Defence on Letters from the President on Employment of South African National Defence Force in Mozambique Channel, Democratic Republic of Congo, to Wuhan City in Hubei Province of People’s Republic of China, and in support of South African Police Service and other State Departments (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 19 June 2020, p 3).
tso: Ku tekeriwa enhlokweni ka Xiviko xa Komiti ya Nkarhi Hinkwawo ya Nhlanganelo hi mayelana na ku yimeleriwa ka Mapapila yo huma eka Presidente ya Ku Thoriwa ka Masocha yo Sirhelela Afrika-Dzonga eka Chanele ya Mozambique, Rhiphabliki ra Xidemokirasi ra Congo, Dorobankulu ra Wuhan eka Xifundzankulu xa Hubei, eka Dorobankulu ra Wuhan Rhiphabliki ra Vanhu ra China na ku seketeriwa hi Vukorhokeri bya Maphorisa ya Afrika-Dzonga na Tindzawulo tin’wana ta Mfumo (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 19 Khotavuxika 2020, papila ra 3).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Employment and Labour on Second Quarterly Report regarding performance of Department of Employment and Labour and entities in meeting strategic objectives for 2019/20 (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 18 June 2020, p 120).
tso: Ku tekeriwa enhlokweni ka Xiviko xa Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Vuthori na Vatirhi hi mayelana na Xiviko xa Kotara hi Kotara xa Vumbirhi xa matirhelo ya Ndzawulo ya swa Vuthori na Vatirhi na mihlangano ya yona eka ku fikelela swikongomelonkulu swa qhinga hi 2019/20 (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 18 Khotavuxika 2020, papila ra 120)

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Employment and Labour on First Quarterly Report regarding performance of Department of Employment and Labour and entities in meeting strategic objectives for 2019/20 (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 18 June 2020, p 81).
tso: Ku tekeriwa enhlokweni ka Xiviko xa Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Vuthori na vatirhi hi mayelana na Xiviko xa Kotara hi Kotara xo Sungula xa matirhelo ya Ndzawulo ya Vuthori na Vatirhi na minhlangano ya yona eka ku fikelela swikongomelonkulu swa qhinga hi 2019/20 (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 18 Khotavuxika 2020, papila rap 81).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Employment and Labour on Third Quarterly Report regarding performance of Department of Employment and Labour and entities in meeting strategic objectives for 2018/19 (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 18 June 2020, p 12).
tso: Ku tekeriwa enhlokweni ka Xiviko xa Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Vuthori na Vatirhi hi mayelana na Xiviko xa Kotara hi Kotara xa Vunharhu xa matirhelo ya Ndzawulo ya swa Vuthori na Vatirhi na mihlangano ya yona eka ku fikelela swikongomelonkulu swa qhinga hi 2018/19 (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 18 Khotavuxika 2020, papia ra 12).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Employment and Labour on Oversight visit to Compensation Fund Head-Quarters (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 18 June 2020, p 3).
tso: Ku tekeriwa enhlokweni ka Xiviko xa Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Vuthori na Vatirhi hi mayelana na rendzo ro Hoxa tihlo eka Hofisinkulu ya Nkwama wa Ndziriso (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 18 Khotavuxika 2020, papila 3).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Trade and Industry on Departments of Trade and Industry and of Economic Development’s Third Quarter Financial and Non-financial Performance for 2019/20 financial year (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 19 May 2020, p 3).
tso: Ku tekeriwa enhlokweni ka Xiviko xa Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Bindzu na Vumaki hi mayelana na Ndzawulo ya swa Bindzu na Vumaki na Matirhelo ya swa Timali na yo ka ya nga ri ya timali ya Kotara ya Vunharhu ya Ndzawulo ya swa Nhluvukiso wa Ikhonomi eka lembeximali ra 2019/20 (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 19 Mudyaxihi 2020, papila ra 3).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on International Relations and Cooperation on Oversight visit on pilot project for acquisition of office accommodation for South African Permanent Mission to United Nations and Consulate-General in New York, United States of America (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 16 March 2020, p 11).
tso: Ku tekeriwa enhlokweni ka Xiviko xa Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Vuxaka bya Matiko Misava na Timhaka ta Ndhavuko hi mayelana na  rendzo ro Hoxa tihlo eka phurojeke yo ringeta ya makumelo ya ndhawu ya hofisi ya Mixini wa Nkarhi Hinkwawo ya Afrika-Dzonga eka Nhlangano wa Matiko na Khonsuleti-Jenerali eNew York, United States of America (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 16 Nyenyankulu 2020, papila 11).

eng: Decision of Question on Report of Portfolio Committee on Higher Education, Science and Technology on 2019/20 First Quarter financial and service delivery performance report of Department of Higher Education and Training (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 5 December 2019, p 64).
tso: Xiboho hi mayelana na Xiviko xa Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Dyondzo ya le Henhla, Sayense na Thekinoloji eka Swiviko hi mayelana na xiviko xa Kotara yo Sungula xa matirhelo ya swa timali na mphakelo wa vukorhokeri xa Dyondzo ya le Henhla na Vuleteri (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 5 N’wendzamhala 2019, papila ra 64).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee Public Service and Administration on Second and Third quarter performance of 2019/20 financial year: Department Public Service and Administration, Entities and Public Service Commission (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 11 March 2020, p 30).
tso: Ku tekeriwa enhlokweni ka Xiviko xa Komito ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Vukorhokeri bya Mfumo na Vulawuri eka Matirhelo ya Kotara ya Vumbirhi na ya Vunharhu ya lembeximali ra 2019/20: Ndzawulo ya Vukorhokeri bya Mfumo na Vulawuri, Minhlangano na Khomixini ya Mintirho ya Mfumo (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 11 Nyenyankulu 2020, papila ra  30).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee Public Service and Administration on Second and Third quarter performance of 2019/20 financial year: Statistics South Africa (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 11 March 2020, p 23).
tso: Ku tekeriwa enhlokweni ka Xiviko xa Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Vukorhokeri bya Mfumo na Vulawuri eka Matirhelo ya Kotara ya Vumbirhi na ya Vunharhu ya lembeximali ra 2019/20: Tinhlayonhlayo ta Afrika-Dzonga (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 11 Nyenyankulu 2020, papila ra 23).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee Public Service and Administration on Second and Third quarter performance of 2019/20 financial year: Department of Planning, Monitoring and Evaluation and Brand South Africa (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 11 March 2020, p 15).
tso: Ku tekeriwa enhlokweni ka Xiviko xa Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Vukorhokeri bya Mfumo na Vulawuri eka Matirhelo ya Kotara ya Vumbirhi na ya Vunharhu ya lembe ximali ra 2019/20: Ndzawulo yo Pulana, ku Kambisisa Matirhelo no Pima na Burende ya Afrika-Dzonga (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 11 Nyenyankulu 2020, papila ra 15).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Basic Education on oversight visit to Capricorn and Sekhukhune Education Districts, Limpopo Province (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 26 February 2020, p 6).
tso: Ku tekeriwa enhlokweni ka Xiviko xa Komiti Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Dyondzo ya le Hansi eka rendzo ro hoxa tihlo eka Swifundza swa Dyondzo swa Capricorn na Sekhukhune, Xifundzankulu xa Limpopo (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 26 Nyenyenyana 2020, papila ra 6).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Basic Education on Submission from the Griqua People’s Heritage on the lack of a Primary School (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 11 February 2020, p 5).
tso: Ku tekeriwa enhlokweni ka Xiviko xa Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Dyondzo ya le Hansi eka Swibumabumelo swo huma eka Ndzhaka ya Vanhu va le Griqua eka ku pfumaleka ka Xikolo xa Purayimari (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 11 Nyenyenyana 2020, papila ra 5).

eng: Consideration of Report of Joint Standing Committee on Financial Management of Parliament on Parliament of Republic of South Africa’s performance in first quarter of 2019/20 (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 9 December 2019, p 20).
tso: Ku tekeriwa enhlokweni ka Xiviko xa Komiti Nkarhi Hinkwawo ya Nhlanganelo ya Mafambiselo ya Timali ta Palamende eka Matirhelo ya Palamende ya Riphabliki ra Afrika-Dzonga eka kotara yo sungula ya 2019/20 (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 9 N’wendzamhala 2019, papila ra 20).

eng: Consideration of Report of Joint Standing Committee on Financial Management of Parliament on Parliament of Republic of South Africa’s 2018/19 Annual Report (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 9 December 2019, p 5).
tso: Ku tekeriwa enhlokweni ka Xiviko xa Komiti ya Nkarhi Hinkwawo ya Nhlanganelo ya Mafambiselo ya Timali ta Palamende eka Xiviko xa Palamende ya Riphabliki ra Afrika-Dzonga xa Lembe ra 2019/20 (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 9 N’wendzamhala 2019, papila ra 5).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Higher Education, Science and Technology on 2018/19 Annual Reports of National Skills Fund and Sector Education and Training Authorities (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 5 December 2019, p 24).
tso: Ku tekeriwa enhlokweni ka Xiviko xa Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Dyondzo ya le Henhla, Sayense na Thekinoloji eka Swiviko swa Vulawuri bya Nkwama wa Swikili wa Rixaka na Dyondzo ya Xiyenge na Vuleteri swa Lembe ra 2018/19 (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 5 N’wendzamhala 2019, papila ra 24).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Trade and Industry on Departments of Trade and Industry and of Economic Development’s Second Quarter Financial and Non-financial Performance for 2019/20 financial year (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 5 December 2019, p 4).
tso: Ku tekeriwa enhlokweni ka Xiviko xa Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya Mabindzu na Vumaki ya swa Ndzawulo ya Mabindzu na Vumaki na ya Nhluvukiso wa Ikhonomi ya Kotara ya Vumbirhi xa Matirhelo ya Timali na yo ka ya nga ri ya timali ya lembeximali ra 2019/20 (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 5 N’wendzamhala 2019, papila ra 4).

eng: Consideration of Report of Standing Committee on Auditor-General on Integrated Annual Report of Auditor-General for financial year 2018/19 (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 4 December 2019, p 3).
tso: Ku tekeriwa enhlokweni ka Xiviko xa Komiti ya Nkarhi Hinkwawo ya swa Mukambelatinkota eka Xiviko xa lembe lexi Hlanganisiweke xa Mukambelatinkotankulu xa lembe ximali ra 2018/19 (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 4 N’wendzamhala 2019, papila ra 3).

eng: MOTIONS (Notice given previously):
tso: TIMOXINI (Xitiviso lexi nyikiweke eka nkarhi lowu nga hundza):

eng: See p 94-96 (Ms R C Adams, Mr S Ngcobo, Ms M S Khawula, Ms N G Adoons, Mr S L Ngcobo, Ms T Breedt, Ms T Mgweba, Mr W M Thring, Mr N L S Kwankwa, Mr M L Shelembe, Mrs E N Ntlangwini, Ms F A Masiko, Mr S H Mbuyane, Ms A S Hlongo, M.Gen O S Terblanche, Mr M G E Hendricks, Mr T S Mpanza, Mr P P Keetse, Ms R C Adams).
tso: Vona papila ra 94-96 (Manana R C Adams, Tatana S Ngcobo, Manana M S Khawula, Manana N G Adoons, TatanaS L Ngcobo, Manana T Breedt, Manana T Mgweba, Tatana W M Thring, Tatana N L S Kwankwa, Tatana M L Shelembe, Manana E N Ntlangwini, Manana F A Masiko, Tatana S H Mbuyane, Manana A S Hlongo, Jeneralinkulu O S Terblanche, TatanaM G E Hendricks, Tatana T S Mpanza, Tatana P P Keetse, Manana R C Adams).

eng: MOTIONS (Notice given on 26 June 2020):
tso: TIMOXINI (Xitiviso lexi nyikiweke hi ti 26 Khotavuxika 2020)

eng: Subject for discussion (Mr K J Mileham): The impending shortage of diesel in the Republic and the dire consequences this will have on the country’s ailing economy and food security.
tso: Mhaka leyi ku nga ta kaneriwa hayona (Tatana K J Mileham): Ku kayivela ka dizele lo ku nga le kusuhi no endleka eka Riphabliki na switandzhaku swo tika leswi nga ta va kona eka ikhonomi ya tiko leyi nga tshamisekangiki na le ka nsirhelelo wa swakudya.

eng: APPENDIXES
tso: SWITANDZHAKU

eng: PETITIONS REFERRED TO COMMITTEES
tso: TIPHETHIXINI LETI HUNDZISERIWEKE EKA TIKOMITI

eng: Petition from the residents of the City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the chronic inadequate refuse removal services in their area (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
tso: Phethixini yo suka eka vaaki va le ka Dorobankulu ra le Ekurhuleni, lava rhambaka Huvo ya Rixaka ku lavisisa ku pfumaleka ka vukorhokeri byo rhwalela thyaka endhawini ya ka vona (Manana H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Mafumelo ya Ntirhisano na Timhaka ta Ndhavuko – Huvo ya Rixaka).

eng: Petition from the residents of Kokomeng and neighbouring villages, calling on the Assembly to investigate and prioritize the re-opening of the Kokomeng police station (Mr I S Seitlholo) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
tso: Phethixini yo suka vaaki va muganga wa le Kokomeng na miganga leyi akelaneke na wona lava rhamabaka Huvo ya Rixaka ku lavisisa na ku rhangisa emahlweni ku pfuriwa nakambe ka xitichi xa maphorisa xa le Kokomeng (Tatana I S Seitlholo) – (Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Maphorisa - Huvo ya Rixaka).

eng: Petition from the residents of Bredell, Pomona, Brentwood Park and Glen Marais (ward 25), City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the collapse of the reliable supply of electricity in their areas (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
tso: Phethixini yo suka eka vaaki va le Bredell, ePomona, Brentwood Park na le Glen Marais (wadi ya 25), Dorobankulu ra le Ekurhuleni, lava rhambaka Huvo ya Rixaka ku lavisisa ku wa ka mphakelo wo tshembheka wa gezi eka tindhawu ta ka vona (Manana H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Vuangameri ya huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Mafumelo ya Ntirhisano na Timhaka ta Ndhavuko – Huvo ya Rixaka).

eng: Petition from the residents of Actonville, Benoni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the high rentals paid by tenants of council-owned flats (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Human Settlements, Water and Sanitation – National Assembly).
tso: Phethixini yo suka eka vaaki va le Actonville, eBenoni, lava rhambaka Huvo ya Rixaka leswaku yi lavisisa tihakelo ta le henhla swinene ta rhente leti hakeriwaka hi vahiri va tifulete ta khansele (Manana H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Vuangameri ya huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Matshamelo ya Vanhu, Mati na Mbhasiso – Huvo ya Rixaka).

eng: Petition from the residents of Jamestown, Stellenbosch, calling on the Assembly to investigate the transfer, by Eskom, of management powers over the electricity network in Jamestown to Stellenbosch municipality (Dr L Shreiber) – (Portfolio Committee on Public Enterprises -  National Assembly).
tso: Phethixini yo suka eka vaaki va le Jamestown, eStellenbosch, lava rhambaka Huvo ya Rixaka leswaku yi lavisisa ku hundziseriwa ka matimba ya vulawuri bya netiweke ya gezi eJamestown hi Eskom ku ya eka masipala wa Stellenbosch (Dr L Shreiber) – (Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Mabindzu ya Mfumo – Huvo ya Rixaka).

eng: Petition from the residents of Germiston, Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate power outages in Germiston (Ms M Clarke) – (Portfolio Committee on Public Enterprises - National Assembly).
tso: Phethixini yo suka eka vaaki va le Germiston, Ekurhuleni, lava rhambaka Huvo ya Rixaka leswaku yi lavisisa ku timeka ka gezi eGermiston (Manana M Clarke) – (Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Mabindzu ya Mfumo – Huv ya Rixaka).

eng: Petition from the residents of Letsitele Town, Ward 23, Tzaneen, calling on the Assembly to ensure that the Tzaneen municipality abides by the laws, by-laws and regulations, and that it implements the prescribed environmental and applicable zoning, as well as monitor and halt all illegal activities (Ms D van der Walt) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs - National Assembly).
tso: Phethixini yo suka eka vaaki va le Letsitele Town, Ward 23, Tzaneen, lava rhambaka Huvo ya Rixaka leswaku yi tiyisisa leswaku Masipala wa Tzaneen wu landzelela milawu, milawu ya doroba na swinawana, na leswaku masipala wu tirhisa mazonele ya mbangu na lama tirhaka, lu latsa na vulanguteri no herisa migingiriko yo ka y inga ri enawini (Manana D van der Walt) – (Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Mafumele ya Ntirhisano na Timhaka ta Ndhavuko – Huvo ya rixaka).

eng: Petition from the farmers and the community of Tzaneen, Limpopo, represented by AGRI Letaba, calling on the Assembly to investigate severe electricity outages, power dips, low voltage and poor to no maintenance since 2016 as a result of the failure of the Greater Tzaneen Municipality (Ms D van der Walt) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
tso: Phethixini yo suka eka van’wamapurasi na vaaki va lezaneen, Limpopo, lava yimeriwaka hi AGRI Letaba, lava rhambaka Huvo ya Rixaka leswaku yi lavisisa ku timeka ka gezi, ku ya ehansi ka matimba ya gezi, vholuteji ya le hansi na na nhlayiso wa le hansi ku ya eka ku pfumaleka ka nhlayiso ku sukela hi 2016 leswi vangiwaka hi ku hluleka ku tirha ka Masipala wa Greater Tzaneen (Manana D van der Walt) – (Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Mafumele ya Ntirhisano na Timhaka ta Ndhavuko – Huvo ya rixaka).

eng: BILLS INTRODUCED AND TO BE REFERRED TO COMMITTEES
tso: MILAWUMBISI LEYI TIVISIWEKE NO HUNDZISERIWEKE EKA TIKOMITI

eng: Division of Revenue Amendment Bill [B 9 - 2020] (National Assembly – sec 76).
tso: Nawumbisi wo Cinca Maavelo ya Timali ta Tiko wa [B 9 - 2020] (Huvo ya Rixaka – xiyenge xa 76).

eng: Adjustments Appropriation Bill [B 10 - 2020] (National Assembly –sec 77).
tso: Nawumbisi wa Macincelo ya Mikavelo wa [B 10 - 2020] (Huvo ya Rixaka – xiyenge xa 77).

eng: BILLS REFERRED TO JOINT TAGGING MECHANISM (JTM)
tso: MILAWUMBISI LEYI HUNDZISERIWEKE EKA NDLELA YO FUNGHA YA NHLANGANELO (JTM)

eng: Upgrading of Land Tenure Rights Amendment Bill [B 6 - 2020] (National Assembly – proposed sec 76).
tso: Nawumbisi wo Cinca Ku Antswisiwa ka Timfanelo ta Vun’wini bya Misava wa [B 6 – 2020] (Huvo ya Rixaka – xiyenge xa 76 lexi ringanyetiweke).

eng: BILLS REFERRED TO COMMITTEES
tso: MILAWUMBISI LEYI HUNDZISERIWEKE EKA TIKOMITI

eng: Protection of State Information Bill [B 6H – 2010] (National Assembly – sec 75) and the President’s reservations on the constitutionality of the Bill as submitted to him (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 12 June 2020, p 7) – (Portfolio Committee on Justice and Correctional Services – National Assembly).
tso: Nawumbisi wa Ku Sirheleriwa ka Mahungu ya Tiko wa [B 6H – 2010] (Huvo ya Rixaka– xiyenge xa 75) na ku kanakana ka Presidente hi mayelana mfambelano na Vumbiwa tanihilaha wu yisiweke hakona eka yena (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 12 JKhotavuxika 2020, papila ra 7) – (Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Vululami na Vukorhokeri bya Makhotso– Huvo ya Rixaka).

eng: Liquor Products Amendment Bill [B 10B – 2016] (National Assembly – sec 75) and the President’s reservations on the constitutionality of the Bill as submitted to him (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 12 June 2020, p 2) – (Portfolio Committee on Agriculture, Land Reform and Rural Development – National Assembly).
tso: Nawumbisi wo Cinca Swimakiwa swa Byalwa wa [B 10B – 2016] (Huvo ya Rixaka– xiyenge xa 75) na ku kanakana ka Presidente hi mayelana na mfambelano na Vumbiwa tanihilaha wu yisiweke hakona eka yena (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 12 Khotavuxika 2020, papila ra 2) - (Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Vurimi, Mpfuxeto wa Misava na Nhluvukiso wa Tindhawu ta le Matikoxikaya – Huvo ya Rixaka).

eng: Performers’ Protection Amendment Bill [B 24B - 2016] (National Assembly – sec 75) and the President’s reservations on the constitutionality of the Bill as submitted to him (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 22 June 2020, p 2) – (Portfolio Committee on Trade and Industry – National Assembly).
tso: Nawumbisi wo Cinca Ku Sirheleriwa ka Vayimbeleri wa [B24B - 2016] (Huvo ya Rixaka–xiyenge xa 75).	 [B 24B - 2016] (Huvo ya Rixaka– xiyenge xa 75) na ku kanakana ka Presidente hi mayelana mfambelano wa Nawumbisi na Vumbiwa tanihilaha wu yisiweke hakona eka yena (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 22 Khotavuxika 2020, papila ra 2) – (Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Bindzu na Vumaki – Huvo ya Rixaka).

eng: Traditional Courts Bill [B 1B – 2017] (National Assembly – sec 76) – (Select Committee on Security and Justice – National Council of Provinces).
tso: Nawumbisi wa Tikhoto ta Ndhavuko wa [B 1B – 2017] (Huvo ya Rixaka – xiyenge xa 76) – (Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya Swifundzankulu ya swa Vusirheleri na Vululami – Huvo ya Rixaka ya Swifundzankulu).

eng: Cybercrimes Bill [B 6B – 2017] (National Assembly – sec 75) (introduced as Cybercrimes and Cybersecurity Bill [B 6 – 2017]) – (Portfolio Committee on Justice and Correctional Services – National Assembly).
tso: Nawumbisi wa Vugevenga bya le ka Inthanete wa [B 6B – 2017] (Huvo ya Rixaka – xiyenge xa 75) (lowu tivisiweke tanihi Nawumbisi wa Vugevenga bya le ka Inthanete na vuhlayiseki bya le ka Inthanete wa [B 6 – 2017]) – Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Vululami na Vukorhokeri bya Makhotso – Huvo ya Rixaka).

eng: Copyright Amendment Bill [B 13B - 2017] (National Assembly – sec 75) and the President’s reservations on the constitutionality of the Bill as submitted to him (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 22 June 2020, p 2) – (Portfolio Committee Trade and Industry – National Assembly).
tso: Nawumbisi wo Cinca Nsirhelelo wa Matsalwa wa [B13B - 2017] (Huvo ya Rixaka–xiyenge xa 75) na ku kanakana ka Presidente hi mayelana mfambelano wa Nawumbisi na Vumbiwa tanihilaha wu yisiweke hakona eka yena (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 22 JKhotavuxika 2020, papila ra 2) – (Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Bindzu na Vumaki – Huvo ya Rixaka).

eng: Road Accident Benefit Scheme Bill [B 17B – 2017] (National Assembly – sec 75) – (Portfolio Committee on Transport – National Assembly).
tso: Nawumbisi wa Xikimu xa Mbuyelo wa Tinghozi ta le Magondzweni wa [B 17B – 2017] (Huvo ya Rixaka – xiyenge xa 75) – (Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Vutleketli – Huvo ya Rixaka).

eng: International Crimes Bill [B 37 – 2017] (National Assembly – sec 75) – (Portfolio Committee on Justice and Correctional Services – National Assembly).
tso: Nawumbisi wa Vugevenga bya Matiko ya Misava wa [B 37 – 2017] (Huvo ya Rixaka – xiyenge xa 75) – (Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Vululami na Vukorhokeri bya Makhotso – Huvo ya Rixaka).

eng: Airports Company Amendment Bill [B 5B – 2018] (National Assembly – sec 75) – (Select Committee on Transport, Public Service and Administration, Public Works and Infrastructure – National Council of Provinces).

eng: INTERNATIONAL AGREEMENTS
tso: MITWANANO YA MATIKO YA MISAVA

eng: Agreement between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (ICGEB) on the Establishment of an International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (ICGEB) Component in the Republic of South Africa (Tabled on 18 September 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Higher Education, Science and Technology on 19 September 2019 - reported on 5 December 2019 – approved on 10 March 2020) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Education and Technology, Sports, Arts and Culture on 19 November 2019 – reported on 26 May 2020).
tso: Ntwanano exikarhi ka Mfumo wa Riphabliki ra Afrika-Dzonga na Senthara ya Matiko ya Tinxaka eka swa Vuinjhiniyere na  Bayotekinoloji (ICGEB) eka ku tumbuluxiwa ka Xiyenge xa Senthara ya Matiko ya Tinxaka ya Vuinjhiniyere bya Bayothekinoloji (ICGEB) eRiphabliki ra Afrika-Dzonga (Lowu andlariweke hi 18 Ndzati 2019) (NA: Lowu hundziseriweke eka Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya Dyondzo ya le Henhla, Sayense na Thekinoloji hi ti 19 Ndzati 2019 – lowu vikiweke hi ti 5 N’wendzamhala 2019 – lowu pasisiweke hi 10 Nyenyankulu 2020). (NCOP: Lowu hundziseriweke eka Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya Swifundzankulu ya swa Dyondzo na Thekinoloji, Mitlangu, Vutshila na Mfuwo hi ti 19 Hukuri 2019 – lowu vikiweke hi ti 26 Mudyaxihi 2020).

eng: Ratification of the Agreement between the Government of the Republic of India, the Government of the Federative Republic of Brazil and the Government of the Republic of South Africa on the IBSA Fund for the Alleviation of Poverty and Hunger (signed 17 October 2017) (Tabled on 18 October 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on International Relations and Cooperation on 22 October 2019) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 24 October 2019).
tso: Ku tiyisisiwa ka Ntwanano exikarhi ka Mfumo wa Riphabliki ra Indiya na Mfumo wa Federali wa Riphabliki ra Brazil na Mfumo wa Riphabliki ra Afrika-Dzonga hi mayelana na Nkwama wa IBSA wa ku Herisiwa ka Vusweti na Ndlala (Lowu sayiniweke hi ti 17 Nhlangula 2017) (Lowu andlariweke hi ti 18 Nhlangula 2019).  (NA: Lowu hundziseriweke eka Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Vuxaka bya Matiko na Ntirhisano hi ti 22 Nhlangula 2019).  (NCOP: Lowu hundziseriweke eka Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya Swifundzankulu ya swa Vusirheleri na Vululami hi ti 24 Nhlangula 2019).

eng: Agreement between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the European Atomic Energy Community (EURATOM) for Co-operation in the Peaceful Uses of Nuclear Energy (Tabled on 14 November 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Mineral Resources and Energy on 18 November 2019).
tso: Ntwanano exikarhi ka Mfumo wa Riphabliki ra Afrika-Dzonga na Mfumo wa Europian Atomic Energy Community (EURATOM) hi mayelana na ku Tirhisana eka ku Tirhisiwa ka Eneji ya Nyutliya hi ndlela yo Rhula (Lowu andlariweke hi ti 14 Hukuri 2019). (NA: Lowu hundziseriweke eka Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya Swipfuno swa Swicelwa na Eneji hi ti 18 Hukuri 2019).

eng: Treaty between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the Government of the United Mexican States on Mutual Legal Assistance in Criminal Matters (Tabled on 5 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Justice and Correctional Services on 9 March 2020 – reported on 29 May 2020 – approved on 17 June 2020) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 10 March 2020 – reported on 1 June 2020).
tso: Ntwanano exikarhi ka Mfumo wa Riphabliki ra Afrika-Dzonga na Mfumo wa United Mexican States mayelana na ku Pfunana hi swa Nawu eka Timhaka ta Vugevenga (Lowu andlariweke hi ti 5 Nyenyankulu 2020). (NA: Lowu hundziseriweke eka Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Vululami na Vukohokeri bya Makhostso hi ti 9 Nyenyankulu 2020). (NCOP: Lowu yisiweke eka Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya Swifundzankulu ya swa Vuhlayiseki na Vululami hi ti 10 Nyenyankulu 2020 – lowu vikiweke hi ti 1 Khotavuxika 2020).

eng: Treaty between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the Government of the United Mexican States on Extradition (Tabled on 5 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Justice and Correctional Services on 9 March 2020 – reported on 29 May 202 0– approved on 17 June 2020) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 10 March 2020 – reported on 1 June 2020).
tso: Ntwanano exikarhi ka Mfumo wa Riphabliki ra Afrika-Dzonga na Mfumo wa United Mexican States mayelana na ku Tlheriseriwa etikweni ra rikwavo ku ya langutana na nawu (Lowu andlariweke hi ti 5 Nyenyankulu 2020) (NA: Lowu hundziseriweke eka Komiti ya Vuangameri Ya Huvo y Rixaka ya swa Vululami na Vukorhokeri bya Makhotso hi ti 9 Nyenyankulu 2020) (NCOP: Lowu hundziseriweke eka Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya Swifundzankulu ya swa Vululami na Vukohokeri bya Makhotso hi ti 10 Nyenyankulu 2020 – lowu vikiweke hi ti 1 Khotavuxika 2020).

tso: Chatara ya Afrika ya swa Tinhlayohlayo (Leyi andlariweke hi ti 5 Nyenyankulu 2020) (NA: Leyi hundziseriweke eka Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Vukorhokeri bya Mfumo na Vulawuri hi ti 9 Nyenyankulu 2020).

eng: Treaty of Amity and Cooperation (TAC) in South East Asia (Tabled on 18 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on International Relations and Cooperation on 26 March 2020 – reported on 11 June 2020 – approved on 17 June 2020)(NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 29 June 2020) .
tso: Ntwanano wa Vuxaka na Ntirhisano (TAC) eDzongaVuxa bya Asia (Lowu andlariweke hi ti 18 Nyenyankulu 2020) (NA: Lowu hundziseriweke eka Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya Vuxaka bya Matiko ya Misava na Ntirhisano hi ti 26 Nyenyankulu 2020). Lowu vikiweke hi ti 11 Khotavuxika 202 – lowu pfumeleriweke hi ti 17 June 202) (NCOP: Lowu hundziseriweke eka Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya Swifundzankulu ya swa Vusirheleri na Vululami hi 29 Khotavuxika 2020).

eng: MOTIONS:
tso: TIMOXINI:

eng: Draft resolution (Chief Whip of the Majority Party): That the House designates Dr M Q Ndlozi to replace Mr G A Gardee on the Magistrates Commission in terms of section 3(1)(a)(x) of the Magistrates Act (No 90 of 1993).
tso: Xiboho xa mpfapfarhuto (Ximokonkulu xa Vandla leri Fumaka): Leswaku Huvo yi rhumela Dr M Q Ndlozi ku ya siva Tatana G A Gardee eka Khomixini ya Vamajisitarata ku ya hi xiyenge xa 3(1)(a)(x) xa Nawu wa Vamajisitarata (Nomboro ya 90 wa 1993).

eng: Draft resolution (Chief Whip of the Majority Party): That the House suspends Rule 290(2)(a), which provides inter alia that the debate on the Second Reading of the Bill may not commence before at least three Assembly working days have elapsed since the committee’s report was tabled, for the purposes of conducting the Second Reading today on the Division of Revenue Amendment Bill [B 9 - 2020] (National Assembly – sec 76).
tso: Xiboho xa mpfapfarhuto (Ximokonkulu xa Vandla leri Fumaka): Leswaku Huvo yi yimisa Nawu wa 290(2)(a), lowu ku katsa na swin’wana, wu lulamiselaka leswaku njhekanjhekisano wa ku Hlayiwa ra Vumbirhi ka Nawumbisi ku nga sunguli loko ku nga se hundza masiku manharhu yo tirha ya Huvo ku sukela loko xiviko xa komiti xi ta va xi andlariwile, hi swikongomelo swo Hlayiwa ra Vumbirhi namuntlha ka Nawumbisi wo Cinca Maavelo ya Timali ta Tiko wa [B 9 - 2020] (Huvo ya Rixaka – xiyenge xa 76).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Police on Unsolicited petition on Re-enlistment of former Police forum members into Police Service (Mr M Qongqo) (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 26 June 2020, p 20).
tso: Ku tekeriwa enhlokweni ka Xiviko xa Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Maphorisa mayelana na Phethixini leyi endliweke hi ku Tinyikela ya mayelana na ku katsiwa ka khale ka swirho swa foramu ya Maphorisa eka Mitirho ya Maphorisa (Tatana M Qongqo) (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 26 Khotavuxika 2020, papila ra 20).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Police on Petition from the residents of Wattville, Benoni calling on the Assembly to address the escalation of crime, including gender-based violence and violence against children, and the need for a police station in their area (submitted by Ms H Ismail, MP) and Petition from the residents of Actonville, Benoni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the high crime rate and drugs, the provision of police kiosks and police vehicles in their area (submitted by Ms H Ismail, MP) (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 26 June 2020, p 15).
tso: Ku tekeriwa enhlokweni ka Xiviko xa Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Maphorisa mayelana na Phethixini yo suka eka vaaki va le Wattville, eBenoni lava rhambaka Huvo ya Rixaka ku languta vugevenga lebyi nga eku tlakukeni, ku katsa na madzolonga ya swa rimbewu na madozolonga eka vana, na ku laveka ka xitichi xa maphorisa endhawini ya ka vona (leyi tisiweke hi Manana H Ismail, Xirho xa Palamende) na Phethixini yo suka eka vaaki va le Actonville, eBenoni lava rhambaka Huvo ya Rixaka ku lavisisa xiyimo xa le henhla xa vugevenga na swidzidziharisi, vuphakeri bya switichitsongo swa maphorisa na mimovha ya maphorisa endhawini ya ka vona (leyi tisiweke hi Manana H Ismail, Xirho xa Palamende) (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 26 Khotavuxika 2020, papila ra 15).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Police on Petition of Mr Cornelius Basson (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 26 June 2020, p 10).
tso: Ku tekeriwa enhlokweni ka Xiviko xa Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Maphorisa mayelana na Petition of Mr Cornelius Basson (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 26 Khotavuxika 2020, papila ra 10).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Police on Application for Firearm Amnesty declaration (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 26 June 2020, p 9).
tso: Ku tekeriwa enhlokweni ka Xiviko xa Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Maphorisa mayelana na xitiviso xa Xikombelo xa Ndzivalelo wa Swibalesa (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 26 Khotavuxika 2020, papila ra 9).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Police on Petition from the residents of Kempton Park, calling on the Assembly to investigate chronic inadequate visible policing and shortage of vehicles at the Kempton Park police station (submitted by Mr M Waters, MP) (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 26 June 2020, p 4).
tso: Ku tekeriwa enhlokweni ka Xiviko xa Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Maphorisa mayelana na Phethixini yo suka eka vaaki va le Kempton Park lava rhamabaka Huvo ya Rixaka ku lavisisa ku kayivela ka vukona bya maphorisa hi ndlela leyi ringaneleke leswi nga heriki na ku pfumaleka ka mimovha exitichini xa maphorisa xa Kempton Park (leyi tisiweke hi Tatana M Waters, Xirho xa Palamende) (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 26 Khotavuxika 2020, papila ra 4).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Trade and Industry on Departments of Trade and Industry and of Economic Development’s fourth quarter financial and non-financial performance for 2019/20 financial year (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 25 June 2020, p 5).
tso: Ku tekeriwa enhlokweni ka Xiviko xa Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Mabindzu na Vumaki mayelana na matirhelo ya Ndzawulo ya Mabindzu na Vumaki na Ndzawulo ya Nhluvukiso wa Ikhonomi ya timali na yo ka ya nga ri ya timali ya kotara ya vumune ya lembeximali ra 2019/20 (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 25 Khotavuxika 2020, papila ra 5).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Trade and Industry on Oversight visit to Gauteng (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 23 June 2020, p 17).
tso: Ku tekeriwa enhlokweni ka Xiviko xa Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Mabindzu na Vumaki mayelana na Rendzo ro Hoxa tihlo ra le Gauteng (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 23 Khotavuxika 2020, papila ra 17).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Trade and Industry on Oversight visit to Western Cape (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 23 June 2020, p 4).
tso: Ku tekeriwa enhlokweni ka Xiviko xa Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Mabindzu na Vumaki mayelana na Rendzo ro Hoxa tihlo ra le Western Cape (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 23 Khotavuxika 2020, papila ra 4).

eng: Consideration of Report of Joint Standing Committee on Defence on Letters from the President on Employment of South African National Defence Force in Mozambique Channel, Democratic Republic of Congo, to Wuhan City in Hubei Province of People’s Republic of China, and in support of South African Police Service and other State Departments (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 19 June 2020, p 3).
tso: Ku tekeriwa enhlokweni ka Xiviko xa Komiti ya Nkarhi Hinkwawo ya Nhlanganelo hi mayelana na ku yimeleriwa ka Mapapila yo huma eka Presidente ya Ku Thoriwa ka Masocha yo Sirhelela Afrika-Dzonga eka Chanele ya Mozambique, Rhiphabliki ra Xidemokirasi ra Congo, Dorobankulu ra Wuhan eka Xifundzankulu xa Hubei, eka Dorobankulu ra Wuhan Rhiphabliki ra Vanhu ra China na ku seketeriwa hi Vukorhokeri bya Maphorisa ya Afrika-Dzonga na Tindzawulo tin’wana ta Mfumo (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 19 Khotavuxika 2020, papila ra 3).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Employment and Labour on Second Quarterly Report regarding performance of Department of Employment and Labour and entities in meeting strategic objectives for 2019/20 (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 18 June 2020, p 120).
tso: Ku tekeriwa enhlokweni ka Xiviko xa Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Vuthori na Vatirhi hi mayelana na Xiviko xa Kotara hi Kotara xa Vumbirhi xa matirhelo ya Ndzawulo ya swa Vuthori na Vatirhi na mihlangano ya yona eka ku fikelela swikongomelonkulu swa qhinga hi 2019/20 (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 18 Khotavuxika 2020, papila ra 120)

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Employment and Labour on First Quarterly Report regarding performance of Department of Employment and Labour and entities in meeting strategic objectives for 2019/20 (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 18 June 2020, p 81).
tso: Ku tekeriwa enhlokweni ka Xiviko xa Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Vuthori na vatirhi hi mayelana na Xiviko xa Kotara hi Kotara xo Sungula xa matirhelo ya Ndzawulo ya Vuthori na Vatirhi na minhlangano ya yona eka ku fikelela swikongomelonkulu swa qhinga hi 2019/20 (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 18 Khotavuxika 2020, papila rap 81).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Employment and Labour on Third Quarterly Report regarding performance of Department of Employment and Labour and entities in meeting strategic objectives for 2018/19 (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 18 June 2020, p 12).
tso: Ku tekeriwa enhlokweni ka Xiviko xa Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Vuthori na Vatirhi hi mayelana na Xiviko xa Kotara hi Kotara xa Vunharhu xa matirhelo ya Ndzawulo ya swa Vuthori na Vatirhi na mihlangano ya yona eka ku fikelela swikongomelonkulu swa qhinga hi 2018/19 (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 18 Khotavuxika 2020, papia ra 12).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Employment and Labour on Oversight visit to Compensation Fund Head-Quarters (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 18 June 2020, p 3).
tso: Ku tekeriwa enhlokweni ka Xiviko xa Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Vuthori na Vatirhi hi mayelana na rendzo ro Hoxa tihlo eka Hofisinkulu ya Nkwama wa Ndziriso (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 18 Khotavuxika 2020, papila 3).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Trade and Industry on Departments of Trade and Industry and of Economic Development’s Third Quarter Financial and Non-financial Performance for 2019/20 financial year (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 19 May 2020, p 3).
tso: Ku tekeriwa enhlokweni ka Xiviko xa Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Bindzu na Vumaki hi mayelana na Ndzawulo ya swa Bindzu na Vumaki na Matirhelo ya swa Timali na yo ka ya nga ri ya timali ya Kotara ya Vunharhu ya Ndzawulo ya swa Nhluvukiso wa Ikhonomi eka lembeximali ra 2019/20 (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 19 Mudyaxihi 2020, papila ra 3).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on International Relations and Cooperation on Oversight visit on pilot project for acquisition of office accommodation for South African Permanent Mission to United Nations and Consulate-General in New York, United States of America (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 16 March 2020, p 11).
tso: Ku tekeriwa enhlokweni ka Xiviko xa Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Vuxaka bya Matiko Misava na Timhaka ta Ndhavuko hi mayelana na  rendzo ro Hoxa tihlo eka phurojeke yo ringeta ya makumelo ya ndhawu ya hofisi ya Mixini wa Nkarhi Hinkwawo ya Afrika-Dzonga eka Nhlangano wa Matiko na Khonsuleti-Jenerali eNew York, United States of America (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 16 Nyenyankulu 2020, papila 11).

tso: Xiboho hi mayelana na Xiviko xa Komiti ya Vuangameri ya Huvo ya Rixaka ya swa Dyondzo ya le Henhla, Sayense na Thekinoloji eka Swiviko hi mayelana na xiviko xa Kotara yo Sungula xa matirhelo ya swa timali na mphakelo wa vukorhokeri xa Dyondzo ya le Henhla na Vuleteri (Switiviso, Leswi andlariweke na Swiviko swa Komiti, 5 N’wendzamhala 2019, papila ra 64).
